column2: Role and Responsibilities       Leveraging the latest prospecting techniques to create relevant sales opportunities for your Sales Manager. Your prospecting will focus on research, product/prospect fit, cold calling, email prospecting, and consultative discussion.         Primary Responsibilities:           Lead Generation perform research on ideal clients to identify potential decision makers, influencers and buyers in the organization, this group will form cold leads.         Create Sales Appointments perform a drip sales campaign to attract cold leads to take an interest in Bridgera ultimately leading to a qualified sales opportunity / meeting. This includes but is not limited to cold dialing and email touches.         Sales Process research creative ways to leverage tools and techniques to accelerate the creation of leads and qualified sales opportunities.         CRM Knowledge track leads and progress in Salesforce. Use automation tools like email sequences, workflows to make sure leads are managed well.         Success will be measured by the number of sales qualified meetings setup, and number of qualified opportunities generated by the Inside Sales Associate.           Required Skills and Traits:           Strong communication and presentation skills. Must be comfortable cold calling and talking to strangers on the phone.         Self-Motivated to learn. Motivated to win and achieve sales goals. Also motivate to find better ways to operate and assist with expanding our sales capability.         Naturally curious about technology and business.         Approaches problems analytically. Willing and able to self-learn and understand technical concepts and customer problems.         Demonstrate passion and proficiency to develop into a trusted guide for your prospects.         Highly accountable and professionally ethical.         Willingness to work in US time zone business hours.           Required experience:           Bachelor s Degree or equivalent (Business, Marketing or Engineering preferred).         Organizational skills and effective time management to succeed in a semi-autonomous, fast-paced environment.         A high-level understanding of basic IT roles/persona.         Highly effective communication skills oral, written and group.         Strong interpersonal skills to build rapport with prospective and existing customers of all levels.         Previous inside sales experience.         Track record of success within cold calling and emailing needs to deal with high call volumes working with tools and service providers that call prospects using lists provided to them.

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and talented individual to join our dynamic team as a Telecaller for our IT company.  As a Telecaller, you will play a crucial role in engaging with potential clients, promoting our IT products and services, and generating leads through effective telephonic communication. Your exceptional communication skills, persuasive ability, and customer-centric approach will contribute to the overall growth and success of our organization. Responsibilities: Conduct outbound calls to potential clients, introducing our IT products and services, and generating leads. Effectively communicate the value proposition of our products and services to potential customers, addressing their inquiries and providing accurate information. Build and maintain a strong customer database by documenting relevant information and updates during the telephonic interactions. Follow up on leads and inquiries promptly to nurture relationships and move potential clients further along the sales pipeline. Achieve individual and team targets for lead generation and sales conversion by consistently meeting or exceeding key performance indicators (KPIs). Collaborate with the sales team to identify new opportunities, qualify leads, and assist in closing sales deals. Keep abreast of the latest industry trends, market conditions, and competitors' offerings to effectively position our products and services. Provide exceptional customer service by addressing customer concerns, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Maintain accurate records of telephonic interactions, sales activities, and customer feedback using our CRM software. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing and product development, to provide valuable insights from customer interactions and contribute to enhancing our products and services. Requirements: Proven work experience as a Telecaller or similar role in the IT industry. Excellent verbal communication skills with a pleasant and persuasive telephone demeanor. Strong customer service orientation with the ability to empathize with customers and understand their requirements. Ability to effectively articulate technical information in a simplified manner. Self-motivated individual with a target-driven mindset and the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Familiarity with CRM software and proficiency in using telephony systems, such as automatic dialing systems. Exceptional organizational and time management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. Strong problem-solving and negotiation skills to handle customer inquiries and objections. Basic knowledge of IT products and services, including software applications, hardware components, and network solutions, is preferred. High school diploma or equivalent qualification; additional certification in sales or customer service is a plus. Female candidates preferred
column11: Telesales, Telecaller, lead generation, business development, Telemarketer, sales, CRM software

column2: Ramesh sippy academy of cinema and entertainment is looking for Admin Hr And Tele caller to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey1      Outbound Calls:Telecallers make outbound calls to reach out to potential clients, customers, or leads      They may promote products, services, or special offers, and aim to generate interest or close sales      Inbound Calls:Telecallers also handle inbound calls, addressing inquiries, providing information, and assisting customers with their needs      Sales and Lead Generation:One of the primary functions of a Telecaller is to generate sales leads by identifying potential customers and gathering relevant information for follow-up by sales teams      Customer Service:Telecallers provide customer support by addressing queries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to existing customers      Surveys and Feedback:They conduct surveys to gather feedback from customers, which can be used to improve products, services, or customer experience      Appointment Scheduling:Tele Callers may schedule appointments, meetings, or demos for sales representatives or other departments      Script Adherence:They often follow prepared scripts to ensure consistent and accurate communication with customers

column2: Dolphinplacements  is looking for Tele Callar  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    Cold Calling: Make outbound calls to individuals or businesses who may not have prior knowledge of the product or service being offered     Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential leads and prospects who have shown interest in the product or service or fit the target customer profile     Customer Engagement: Build rapport with customers through effective communication, active listening, and addressing their inquiries or concerns     Product/Service Promotion: Promote and explain the features, benefits, and value of the product or service being marketed     Sales and Conversions: Persuade potential customers to make a purchase or take a specific action, such as signing up for a service or scheduling an appointment     Appointment Setting: Schedule appointments or meetings for sales representatives or other professionals within the organization     Follow-Up Calls: Make follow-up calls to nurture leads, answer questions, and facilitate the sales process     Customer Support: Provide information, assistance, or troubleshooting support to existing customers or address their concerns     Data Entry: Accurately record customer information, interactions, and outcomes in the company's CRM or database     Script Adherence: Follow provided scripts or guidelines to ensure consistent messaging and compliance with regulations and company policies

column1: Pre-Counseling Team Lead Shiksha.com Study abroad
column2: About Info Edge  InfoEdges mission is to create world-class platforms that transform lives by continuously innovating. Our products and services are built keeping our customers in mind. We always delight our customers by delivering superior value through enhanced offerings on the internet and other platforms. Through our continuous investment across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), we have built a robust system that constantly increases our predictive powers on customer behaviour, and optimizes and improves our systems. Our various teams tirelessly work together to solve problems, innovate, and create something to empower our customers. At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. About BU: Shiksha.com  Shiksha.com is an online platform that helps students find in-depth information about colleges, courses and exams. It also enables students to interact with domain experts and college/school alumni towards taking exam, course-selection and college-selection related decisions. It has a repository of reliable and authentic information for over 15,000 institutions, 1,40,000 plus courses and gets over 70 million unique visitors per year. Shiksha provides leads of relevant students to Universities and Colleges seeking to admit those students in their courses Title:  Executive/Senior Executive  Required Educational Qualification:  Any Graduation or Any Post Graduation Desired Experience:  2 - 5 years Job Objective:  The objective is to attract prospective students to enroll to study abroad services through outbound calls. Job Description:   Convert pre-generated leads to productive leads with active participation into counseling of students.   Regular engagement with leads / accounts to convert them for enrollment services of study abroad team with Shiksha.com.   Ensure proper documentation with students as per business processes and guidelines of international universities  Maintain MIS and database of qualified leads for effective coordination and conversion Required Skills :  Sales orientation   Excellent communication skills both verbal and written  Data Orientation Desired Skills :  Customer centric approach   Inside sales experience in the education domain. Why Join Us: This is a unique opportunity to work on innovative and disruptive technology driven business solutions, that are shaping the future of the industry. We are looking for candidates who are willing to work passionately in a fast-paced environment and are ready to enhance their skills by learning something new. Being a part of InfoEdge, will allow you to unleash your potential and carve your own career. To learn more about Info Edge visit http://www.infoedge.in/ New office video - https://www.linkedin.com/posts/chandra-prakash-jha-a249555b_infoedge-infoedgeinauguration-shikshastudyabroad-activity-7094660631814914049-y28O? Know more about Shiksha counseling team -  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J31_AQZ_csY

column1: Inside Sales - Day Shift  | Y-Axis Solutions PVT LTD | Delhi Region
column2: Job openings that we have at Delhi Region (Nehru Place & Noida & Gurgaon): Inside Sales     We are Hiring - Inside Sales Consultant, Desk Sales Associate, Education Counsellor, Tele sales 50+ Candidates Needed. Y-Axis is the world's largest immigration and visa company. With 50+ company-owned and managed offices across India, Australia, the United Arab Emirates, the United Kingdom, and Canada and 1500+ employees, we serve over 1 million customers. We manage a high volume of inquiries, exceeding 1 Lakh monthly, from individuals interested in overseas education, work and immigration services. We specialize in providing comprehensive guidance and support to clients navigating the complexities of international opportunities. We are looking for a dynamic Inside Sales Consultant to join us in our mission of creating Global Indians. In this role, you will serve as the primary point of contact for prospective clients. Your responsibilities will include conducting consultations via phone, email, and in-person meetings. Your aim will be to understand client needs, promote our service offerings persuasively, and address inquiries effectively. Benefits : Day job with flexible shifts. Great pay package & commissions Opportunity to work overseas. All statutory benefits like PF, ESI, Maternity and Insurance. Key Responsibilities: Counsel prospective clients on overseas education, work and immigration services      through various communication channels and effectively communicate the      value proposition of our services. Offer expert advice on available options, considering individual circumstances and      preferences and helping customers make informed decisions. Conduct fair evaluation of client profiles to assess suitability for study, immigration and visa opportunities. Develop personalized global career strategies tailored to each client's goals and      aspirations. Stay updated on current immigration and visa laws and policies, delivering accurate      information to customers. Provide exceptional customer service by promptly addressing inquiries and advising      customers on their immigration and visa needs. Achieve  predefined targets for customer acquisition and revenue generation by      implementing effective sales strategies. Required Skills: Excellent communication skills to convey information clearly and listen attentively to client needs. Strong  problem-solving abilities and a customer-centric approach to address inquiries effectively. Proficiency in using computers and online communication tools for online interactions. A sales-driven  mindset with a proactive approach to pursuing opportunities and achieving      targets. Positive attitude, willingness to learn, and adaptability to changing market dynamics. Team player with exceptional relationship-building skills, with the ability to build and      maintain relationships with clients and team members. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree  preferred. Must have a  minimum of 2 years experience in sales, counselling, recruitment  or      customer service roles. Familiarity with overseas education and immigration processes a plus. Are you passionate about helping individuals achieve their overseas education and immigration goals? Are you looking for meaningful work and an opportunity to make an impact every day? We encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join our team and make a meaningful impact on people's lives around the world.   Thanks Rajesh Kumar  N
column11: Inside Sales, Counselling, Sales, Outbound Sales, Telemarketing, Cross Selling, Direct Sales, Concept Selling, Institutional Sales, B2B Sales, Marketing, Communication Skills, Upselling, Team Skills, Business Development, Corporate Sales, Client Relationship

column2: We are looking for a Tele caller to boost our sales by communicating with existing and potential customers. A candidate will be required to gather information from the individual, understand their requirement properly by follow-up calls, maintain the lead status sheet and suggest a probable product with timeline. To be able to provide the best tele calling experience, you must know how to call international clients based in UK and USA.     The job will be rotational shift of 4 hrs. on daily basis. A candidate will be required to call our clients in two different time zones i.e., UK, USA. There is no sales target or successfully closing lead pressure.           Roles and Responsibilities:         Reaching out to existing international (UK, USA) clients to advise them about our products and quotation by utilizing pre-defined scripts.     Studying the details of International inbound leads and calling them to cross verify the exact requirement to make them market qualified.     Obtaining and updating lists of individuals contact details, lead status and remarks.     Calling active or inactive customers and maintaining customer s follow up to get the final lead status on the calling Sheet.     Capture the insights from customer interactions and share it with the internal team.     Ability to learn about products and services and explain them to prospects.     Addressing clients uncertainties, grievances, and suggestions on time.     Communicating with our sales team for getting the up-to-date products requirements.     Recording all successful and unsuccessful attempts of follow up calls.     Attending regular team meetings to clarify progress and performance-related expectations.     Keeps up quality service by adhering to organization guidelines.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Explaining the product features in detail.             Requirements:         Proven experience as a international telesales representative or other customer service role.     B.sc/BA will be added advantage.       Manufacturing industry calling exposure will be added advantage but not mandatory.       Excellent knowledge of the English language.     Good knowledge of Microsoft excel.     Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota over the phone.     Ability to switch communication styles.             Skills:         Proficient in communication and interpersonal skills     Research and record-keeping skills     Verbal communication     Outstanding negotiation skills to resolve issues and address complaints     Data entry skills     Telephone skills

column1: Telesales | B2C AI product  | Times Internet Company
column2: Role & responsibilities     About OutSpark:  OutSpark is a dynamic gaming company established in 2016 and proudly backed by Times Internet, India's largest digital media conglomerate. We specialize in providing innovative AI-driven solutions to job seekers through our OutSpark Resume and OutSpark Interview Prep platforms. Job Overview:  We are urgently seeking enthusiastic and results-driven individuals to join our team as Tele-Sales Specialists. As an integral part of our sales team, you will be responsible for engaging with leads over the phone, promoting our products, and driving sales to meet and exceed targets. Key Responsibilities: Contact leads provided by the marketing team through outbound calls. Conduct product demonstrations and sales pitches over the phone to showcase the benefits of OutSpark Resume and OutSpark Interview Prep. Build rapport with leads and understand their career goals and challenges. Provide personalized consultations over the phone to tailor our products to the unique needs of each lead. Close sales and achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue targets. Collaborate with the marketing team to provide feedback on lead quality and campaign effectiveness. Maintain accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions in the CRM system. Preferred candidate profile     Qualifications: Proven experience in telecalling sales, preferably in a B2C or SaaS environment. Excellent communication and persuasion skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly over the phone. Strong negotiation skills, with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets through telecalling. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Tech-savvy with a keen interest in AI-driven solutions and the future of job seeking. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field preferred. Immediate Joiners Preferred Perks and benefits     Benefits: Competitive salary and attractive incentive structure with uncapped earning potential. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within a rapidly growing company. Comprehensive training and ongoing support to help you succeed in your role. Fun and collaborative work environment with a diverse team of passionate professionals. Health and wellness benefits.   How to Apply:  If you are ready to take on this exciting opportunity and can join immediately, please share your CV at abhishek@coolbootsmedia.com and connect at 9650919633 (call/WhatsApp).

column2: Florencia Healthcare is looking for Tele Sales professionals to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      A tele sales executive, also known as a telemarketer or inside sales representative, is a professional who sells products or services over the phone      They work in call centers or contact centers and engage in outbound calls to reach potential customers, build relationships, and generate sales      The responsibilities of a telesales executive typically include:Making Outbound Calls: Initiating outbound calls to prospective customers using a pre-defined list or database      These calls may be cold calls (contacting leads who have no prior interaction with the company) or warm calls (following up with interested leads or existing customers)      Product or Service Presentation: Presenting and explaining the features, benefits, and value proposition of the products or services being offered      This involves effective communication skills to engage the customer, address their needs, and highlight the unique selling points of the offerings      Handling Customer Inquiries: Responding to customer inquiries and providing information about the products or services      This may involve addressing questions, clarifying doubts, and overcoming objections to persuade the customer to make a purchase      Lead Qualification and Follow-Up: Assessing the potential of leads based on specific criteria or qualifications      Telesales executives determine whether a lead is likely to convert into a sale and prioritize follow-up activities accordingly      Sales Conversion and Closing Deals: Using persuasive selling techniques to convince potential customers to make a purchase      Telesales executives negotiate prices, offer discounts or promotions, and guide customers through the purchasing process to close the sale      Relationship Building: Building rapport and developing relationships with customers to enhance customer loyalty and encourage repeat business      Telesales executives may maintain regular contact with customers, provide after-sales support, and explore opportunities for upselling or cross-selling      Sales Reporting and Documentation: Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and outcomes      This includes updating customer details, recording sales transactions, and generating reports on sales performance and targets      Product Knowledge and Training: Acquiring and maintaining a deep understanding of the products or services being sold      Telesales executives need to be well-versed in product features, specifications, pricing, and frequently asked questions to effectively address customer inquiries      Meeting Sales Targets: Working towards achieving individual and team sales targets set by the organization      Telesales executives are often expected to meet specific sales quotas and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to sales conversion, call volume, and revenue generation      Effective communication skills, persuasive abilities, resilience, and persistence are crucial for success in a tele sales executive role      Active listening, empathy, and adaptability to different customer personalities and situations are also important for building rapport and satisfying customer needs
column11: Telesales

column2: Diverse Lynx is looking for PKI (Public Key Infrastructure) Professional to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey         Understanding of PKI Concepts    : You possess a deep understanding of the fundamental concepts of PKI, including digital certificates, public and private key pairs, certificate authorities (CAs), certificate revocation, certificate signing requests (CSRs), and certificate validation.            PKI Architecture Design    : You can design PKI architectures tailored to the specific needs and security requirements of organizations, considering factors such as scalability, interoperability, and regulatory compliance.            Certificate Authorities (CAs)    : You are knowledgeable about different types of CAs, including root CAs, intermediate CAs, and issuing CAs, and you understand their roles, responsibilities, and trust hierarchies within a PKI infrastructure.            Certificate Lifecycle Management    : You have expertise in managing the entire lifecycle of digital certificates, including certificate issuance, renewal, revocation, and expiration, while ensuring the integrity, confidentiality, and availability of certificate data.            Certificate Policies and Practices    : You are familiar with developing and enforcing certificate policies and practices (CP/CPS) that define the rules, procedures, and standards governing the issuance and use of digital certificates within an organization's PKI.            Security and Cryptography    : You possess a strong understanding of cryptographic algorithms, protocols, and best practices related to PKI security, including encryption, digital signatures, key management, certificate pinning, and cryptographic hash functions.            Integration with Applications and Services    : You can integrate PKI solutions with various applications, services, and network infrastructure components, including web servers, email systems, VPNs, LDAP directories, and IoT devices, to enable secure communication and authentication.
column11: algorithms, server, network security, cyber security, information security, dns, cryptography, microsoft azure, digital certificates, networking, siem, ssl, pki, java, encryption, active directory, ldap, firewall, linux, integration, aws, dhcp, architecture

column1: Team Leader For Tele - Sales - DYD
column2: As a Team Leader, you will be responsible for managing a team Tele-Sales Executives . Your role will involve overseeing the daily operations of the team, driving sales targets, providing guidance and coaching to team members, and ensuring team s overall success. This position requires strong leadership skills, a thorough understanding of tele-sales techniques, and the ability to motivate and inspire team members to achieve their goals.   Duties and Responsibilities:      Team Management         Supervise and support a team of Tele-Sales Executives in achieving their sales targets and objectives.         Monitor individual and team performance, providing regular feedback and conducting performance evaluations.         Set clear performance expectations and KPIs, and work closely with team members to help them meet and exceed targets.         Conduct regular team meetings to communicate updates, share best practices, and foster a collaborative work environment.         Sales Strategy and Planning         Develop and implement sales strategies and tactics to maximize the team s performance and drive sales growth.         Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to identify target markets, customer segments, and promotional opportunities.         Analyse sales data, market trends, and customer feedback to make informed decisions and adjustments to the sales strategy.         Provide input and suggestions to improve sales processes, scripts, and training materials based on team insights.         Training and Development         Identify training needs and provide ongoing coaching and guidance to team members to improve their sales skills.         Conduct regular training sessions on sales techniques, product knowledge, objection handling, and customer service.         Share industry updates, best practices, and new sales techniques to keep the team informed and motivated.         Foster a learning culture within the team, encouraging continuous professional development.         Performance Monitoring and Reporting         Track individual and team performance metrics, including sales targets, conversion rates, and customer satisfaction   levels.         Prepare regular reports on team performance, key trends, and opportunities for improvement.         Conduct analysis of sales data to identify strengths, weaknesses, and areas for optimization.         Provide insights and recommendations to senior management based on performance analysis.         Communication and Collaboration         Serve as a liaison between the Tele-Sales Executive team and other departments, fostering effective communication and   collaboration.         Communicate sales targets, goals, and performance updates to team members, ensuring alignment with organizational   objectives.         Collaborate with the HR department for recruitment, on boarding, and training of new team members. Employee discounts on travel packages. Health insurance and other benefits.

column2: As a Team Leader, you will be responsible for managing a team Tele-Sales Executives . Your role will involve overseeing the daily operations of the team, driving sales targets, providing guidance and coaching to team members, and ensuring team s overall success.     ?     ?This position requires strong leadership skills, a thorough understanding of tele-sales techniques, and the ability to motivate and inspire team members to achieve their goals.        Duties and Responsibilities:            Team Management      Supervise and support a team of Tele-Sales Executives in achieving their sales targets and objectives.     Monitor individual and team performance, providing regular feedback and conducting performance evaluations.     Set clear performance expectations and KPIs, and work closely with team members to help them meet and exceed targets.     Conduct regular team meetings to communicate updates, share best practices, and foster a collaborative work environment.         Sales Strategy and Planning      Develop and implement sales strategies and tactics to maximize the team s performance and drive sales growth.     Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to identify target markets, customer segments, and promotional opportunities.     Analyse sales data, market trends, and customer feedback to make informed decisions and adjustments to the sales strategy.     Provide input and suggestions to improve sales processes, scripts, and training materials based on team insights.         Training and Development      Identify training needs and provide ongoing coaching and guidance to team members to improve their sales skills.     Conduct regular training sessions on sales techniques, product knowledge, objection handling, and customer service.     Share industry updates, best practices, and new sales techniques to keep the team informed and motivated.     Foster a learning culture within the team, encouraging continuous professional development.         Performance Monitoring and Reporting      Track individual and team performance metrics, including sales targets, conversion rates, and customer satisfaction   levels.     Prepare regular reports on team performance, key trends, and opportunities for improvement.     Conduct analysis of sales data to identify strengths, weaknesses, and areas for optimization.     Provide insights and recommendations to senior management based on performance analysis.         Communication and Collaboration      Serve as a liaison between the Tele-Sales Executive team and other departments, fostering effective communication and   collaboration.     Communicate sales targets, goals, and performance updates to team members, ensuring alignment with organizational   objectives.     Collaborate with the HR department for recruitment, on boarding, and training of new team members.     Act as a point of contact for addressing team members queries, concerns, and escalations.               Desired Profile:            Bachelor s degree in business, management, or a related field.     Previous experience in tele-sales leadership role.     Strong understanding of tele-sales techniques, customer service, and sales processes.     Good communication and interpersonal skills to deal with Senior management     Analytical mind-set, Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.     Proficiency in using CRM software, Dialler, sales reporting tools, and Microsoft Office applications.     Leadership qualities such as problem-solving, decision-making, and conflict resolution skills.

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and target-driven individual to join our real estate team as a Lead Processing Executive (LPE). The primary responsibility of the LPE will be to engage with potential leads over calls, effectively communicate the value proposition of our real estate offerings, and convert leads into qualified prospects. The ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills, persuasive abilities, and a strong understanding of the real estate industry.             Responsibilities   :             Lead Engagement:       Engage with potential leads promptly and professionally through outbound and inbound calls.     Effectively communicate the features, benefits, and value proposition of our real estate projects to generate interest and excitement.     Build rapport with leads, understand their requirements, and address any concerns or questions they may have.     Maintain accurate and detailed records of all lead interactions in the CRM system.     Lead Qualification and Conversion:     Qualify leads based on predetermined criteria to determine their level of interest, budget, and readiness to make a purchase.     Guide and assist leads in scheduling site visits, virtual tours, or meetings with our sales representatives.     Follow up with leads who have shown interest but have not yet converted, utilizing persuasive techniques to encourage them to move forward in the sales process.     Collaborate with the sales team to ensure a seamless transition of qualified leads and provide necessary background information.     Product Knowledge and Market Awareness:     Stay updated with the latest information about our real estate projects, including pricing, features, amenities, and financing options.     Keep abreast of market trends, competitor offerings, and industry developments to effectively position our projects and differentiate them from the competition.     Continuously improve product knowledge through training sessions, self-study, and research.     Performance Tracking and Reporting:     Track and report key performance indicators (KPIs) related to lead engagement, qualification, and conversion rates.     Provide regular updates on lead status, progress, and feedback to the sales and marketing teams.     Assist in generating reports and analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of lead generation and conversion strategies.                   Requirements   :           High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or certifications in sales or real estate will be a plus.     Proven experience in telesales, customer service, or lead generation, preferably within the real estate industry.     Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to build rapport and influence potential customers.     Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities to convert leads into qualified prospects.     Customer-centric approach with a focus on delivering exceptional service and building long-term relationships.     Familiarity with CRM systems and lead management software.     Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and meet targets.     Sound knowledge of the local real estate market, including market trends, competitor projects, and customer preferences.     Proficiency in using basic computer applications (MS Office, email, etc.)

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Associate Sales Executive to join our team. As an Associate Sales Executive, you will be responsible for generating leads, pitching products/services to potential clients, and closing deals to meet sales targets. This role involves a balanced mix of field and office work, with approximately 50% of your time spent meeting clients in the field and the remaining 50% in the office handling administrative tasks and follow-ups. Responsibilities: Actively seek out new sales opportunities through networking, cold calling, and social media. Conduct face-to-face meetings with potential clients to understand their needs and present appropriate solutions. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships. INCENTIVES : 10,000- 30,000 per month based on performance SHIFT TIMINGS : 8 PM- 5 AM (Night shift) Desired Candidate Profile: Must possess  excellent communication  skills. Computer knowledge. column2: As a fresher in bank tele sales, you'd be reaching out to potential customers over the phone. Your main goal would be to inform them about the bank's products and services, which is mainly insurance -  Health Insurance, Motor Insurance, Travel Insurance , and persuade them to sign up or buy. The responsible person needs to be really good at communicating, both listening and speaking, and have some solid sales skills. Patience is key too, because not every call will be easy. Plus, they'll have to keep track of their calls and follow-ups. Required skills: 1. Excellent Communication:  Being able to clearly convey information and actively listen to customers is crucial. You should be able to explain complex financial products in a simple and understandable way. 2. Persuasive Skills:  As a tele sales representative, you'll need to be persuasive and convincing to encourage customers to take action. This involves building rapport, addressing objections, and highlighting the benefits of the bank's products. 3. Product Knowledge:  Having a good understanding of the bank's products and services is important. You should be able to answer customer questions and provide accurate information to help them make informed decisions. 4. Time Management:  Tele sales can be fast-paced, so being able to manage your time effectively is key. You'll need to balance multiple calls, follow-ups, and administrative tasks efficiently. 5. Resilience:  Not every call will result in a sale, so having the ability to handle rejection and maintain a positive attitude is important. Resilience will help you bounce back and stay motivated.
column11: Telesales, Cross Selling, Banking Sales, Banking Products

column2: Job Brief         We are looking for an enthusiastic Customer Support Associate (Sales) to contribute in generating sales for our company.     You will be responsible for closing sales deals over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships.     An effective telesales representative must be an excellent communicator and have superior people skills.     They must be comfortable presenting products or services over the phone as well as dealing with complaints and doubts.     The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers and developing business.         Requirements         Outstanding written and verbal communication skills, Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection, Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints     Understanding of customer needs, Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Strong Technical skills         Responsibilities         Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service, Answer questions about products or the company     Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sales, Take and process orders in an accurate manner     Meet sales targets, Mentor team members and teach improved processes in order to enhance staff accomplishments   .

column2: We are seeking a resilient and goal-oriented individual to join our team as a Customer Sales and Debt Collection Representative. This position involves a dynamic and challenging environment,?requiring a candidate who thrives under pressure, is willing to stretch working hours, and is motivated by performance incentives.?In this role, you will be responsible for upselling products/services to existing clients, managing debt collection, and maximizing revenue opportunities. **Key Responsibilities:** 1. **Upselling:** ? ?- Proactively engage with existing clients to introduce new products/services and achieve upselling targets. ? ?- Tailor sales strategies to individual customer needs, showcasing a deep understanding of our offerings. ? ?- Adapt to a fast-paced environment and handle a high volume of customer interactions. 2. **Debt Collection:** ? ?- Initiate contact with customers to address overdue accounts, negotiate payment plans, and ensure timely debt recovery. ? ?- Manage a portfolio of accounts, implementing effective collection strategies under tight deadlines. ? ?- Navigate challenging conversations with empathy and professionalism. 3. **Customer Communication:** ? ?- Provide exceptional customer service, addressing inquiries, and building positive relationships. ? ?- Communicate clearly and persuasively to convey the value of additional products/services. 4. **Incentive-Driven Performance:** ? ?- Meet and exceed sales and debt collection targets to qualify for performance incentives. ? ?- Embrace a results-oriented mindset, constantly seeking opportunities to enhance performance. **Qualifications:** - High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or relevant certifications a plus. - Proven experience in sales, upselling, or debt collection roles. - Exceptional communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. - Ability to thrive under pressure and handle a high-stress environment. - Flexibility to work extended hours as needed to meet business demands. **Requirements:** - Demonstrated ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team. - Willingness to stretch working hours and adapt to a dynamic schedule. - Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and resilience in challenging situations. - Familiarity with CRM software and basic computer skills. - Adherence to ethical business practices and compliance with relevant regulations. **Incentives:** - Competitive incentive structure based on achieving and exceeding targets. If you are a self-motivated individual who excels in a challenging and dynamic work environment, and you are driven by the opportunity for incentives, we invite you to apply. Join our team and contribute to our success by maximizing revenue, ensuring positive customer relationships, and enjoying the rewards of your hard work. --

column2: Role & responsibilities    We are seeking a motivated and dynamic individual to join our team as a Telesales Executive. The successful candidate will be responsible for generating leads through outbound calls and converting them into sales opportunities. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment and contribute to the growth of our organization. Make outbound calls to potential customers to generate leads and qualify prospects. Understand customer needs and requirements to effectively pitch products or services. Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets and KPIs. Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and customer interactions in the CRM system. Follow up with leads and prospects to ensure a positive customer experience and maximize sales opportunities. Collaborate with the sales team to develop strategies for lead generation and conversion. Stay updated on product knowledge, industry trends, and competitive landscape. Provide feedback to management on market trends, customer needs, and product improvements. Preferred candidate profile     Proven experience in telesales or a similar role. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong sales and negotiation skills. Ability to work well in a team environment. Results-oriented with a focus on achieving sales targets. Good organizational and time management skills.

column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associates For Team Insurance Process ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Mr.Arzoo Seraj- +91-97599-75943 About PolicyBazaar: PolicyBazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace providing a platform to compare and purchase various insurance products.   About the Profile: As an Associate Sales Consultant, you will interact with customers, understand their term insurance needs, and guide them in selecting suitable plans.   About Term Insurance Scheme: Term insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection to the policyholder's family in case of their unfortunate demise during the policy term. These schemes offer a lump sum death benefit to the nominees, helping them manage financial obligations and secure their future. Term insurance plans can be customized based on individual or family requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive term insurance plan can provide peace of mind and financial security for loved ones.   Key Responsibilities: - Respond to inbound inquiries from customers regarding term insurance products. - Evaluate customer needs and recommend suitable term insurance plans. - Clearly explain policy features, coverage, and exclusions to customers. - Guide customers through the online platform for comparing and selecting plans. - Provide exceptional customer service and address concerns promptly. - Cross-sell and upsell related insurance products as per customer requirements. - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities. - Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and goals.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the term insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of term insurance products and terminology is preferred. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Benefits: - CTC upto 4.0 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package - Day shift only - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associates For Motor Insurance ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Srishti Sachdeva- +91-90279-54483 About PolicyBazaar: PolicyBazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace providing a platform to compare and purchase various insurance products.   About the Profile: As an Associate Sales Consultant, you will interact with customers, understand their motor insurance needs, and guide them in selecting suitable plans.   About Motor Insurance Scheme: Motor insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection against damages or losses incurred due to accidents, theft, or natural calamities involving vehicles. These schemes offer coverage for various risks, including third-party liabilities, own damage, and personal accident cover. Motor insurance plans can be tailored to fit individual or commercial requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive motor insurance plan can safeguard vehicle owners from financial burdens arising from unforeseen circumstances.   Key Responsibilities: - Respond to inbound inquiries from customers regarding motor insurance products. - Assess customer requirements and recommend suitable motor insurance plans. - Explain policy features, coverage, exclusions, and additional riders to customers. - Guide customers through the online platform for comparing and selecting plans. - Provide exceptional customer service and address concerns related to motor insurance. - Cross-sell and upsell related insurance products as per customer requirements. - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities. - Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and goals.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the motor insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of motor insurance products, terminologies, and related regulations. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Benefits: - CTC from 3.0 LPA to 4.5 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package - Day shift only - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column2: Customer Support Executive | Mediacle | Digital Media and IT Solutions    Job Location: Bangalore 560 018      Job Role : Customer Support Executive (Call Centre Executive)      No. of openings: 5        Job Description        Mediacle seeks a strong Customer Support Executive for their client s product line.      As a Customer support Executive you will provide service or product information, solutions and relevant      details to customers, provide specific information regarding the services, products or materials offered by a      company. You will answer phones, provide troubleshooting information, report and analyze customers      information and needs, issue billing details and open and close customer accounts. In summary, you are the      direct link between a company and its existing and potential customers        Skills Required        As a Customer support Executive you must have well - developed verbal and written communication skills in      Hindi and English, willing to work in shifts (including weekends). You must have a thorough knowledge of      the service or product and be able to describe its functions, features and details to customers. You must be able      to respond to customer complaints, requests and inquiries in a professional and timely manner. You should      have good organizational skills, general knowledge of Microsoft Office computer programs and be effective      multi - taskers. Also should have experience with customer support tools such as Zen Desk.      Key Functional Areas of Responsibility      Respond to the inbound calls professionally and furnish the customer with information on product and      services or obtain details of the complaints/concerns      Identify and assess customers needs to achieve maximum satisfaction      Build trust and sustainable relationship with customers through interactive communication      Record details of customer interactions, queries, complaints and comments/feedback      Route concerns that require immediate/special attention to concerned departments      Follow up to ensure necessary actions are taken to resolve the customer issues      Identifying, Handling and resolving customer queries and concerns while maintaining expected      quality on calls, chat or email.      Provide/take relevant information and update the system/s accordingly. Where the query cannot be      successfully concluded at the first point of contact, provide the relevant functional area with a clear and      concise written/verbal summary of the situation and its priority. Provide the Customer with a clear      explanation of the action taken.      Ensure complete participation and contribution in organization/process level initiatives that may be      implemented from time to time to improve efficiency Ability to understand and handle irate customers        Qualifications And Experience:        Typing speed of 30 to 40 wpm      Minimum 1 - 3 years of relevant experience of international BPO (Preferred)      Strong interpersonal, problem - solving skills and verbal and written communication skills      Basic computer knowledge and technical skills      Paid vacation and sick days      Opportunity to advance your career      Media agency/IT - Software / Software Services      Mediacle Ltd is a leading digital agency based in a trendy part of Central London. They have experienced      exceptional growth since their inception, and have an extremely impressive client portfolio. They have won      countless awards for quality campaigns, and have a reputation for offering long - term career paths to the very      best in digital marketing and development.      Mediacle Ltd is now recruiting for their Indian office based in Bangalore. Some travel to UK offices and conferences may be required as part of the role.     Hey - I am online if you wish to chat!     Hey - I am online if you wish to chat!

column1: Hiring Female Associates For International Process II Day Shift
column2: Interested Candidates may connect with their Interest Level to   Ms.Surbhi, at +91-78170-00490 (11am-5pm)   About Policybazaar.com : Policybazaar.com is India's largest online insurance marketplace, providing a platform for individuals and businesses to compare and purchase insurance policies. With a commitment to enhancing financial inclusion and providing accessible insurance solutions, Policybazaar.com offers a diverse range of insurance products to ater to the needs of a broad customer base.   Job Summary : Policybazaar.com is seeking dynamic and dedicated female candidates for the role of International Inbound Voice Process. The position involves handling inbound calls from international customers and providing exceptional service, guidance, and support related to insurance products and services.    Working Hours : Day shift only Selection Process : Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.   Key Responsibilities : Handle inbound calls from international customers with professionalism and courtesy. Understand customers' inquiries, concerns, and requirements related to insurance products. Provide accurate and relevant information about insurance products, policies, and services offered by Policybazaar.com. Assist customers in navigating the Policybazaar.com platform to compare and select suitable insurance options. Address customer queries and concerns effectively, ensuring a satisfactory resolution to their issues. Educate customers about various insurance plans and help them make informed decisions. Maintain a high level of customer service by adhering to established processes and quality standards. Document customer interactions and feedback for continuous improvement of services. Collaborate with team members and contribute to a positive and supportive work environment.   Qualifications and Experience : Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar international inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. Experience in the insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies : CTC from 3.0 LPA to 4.5 LPA Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. Ability to handle challenging and varied customer situations with empathy and professionalism. Basic knowledge of insurance products and terminology is preferred. Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.     Join Policybazaar.com and be a part of a leading insurance marketplace, where you can utilize your skills to assist customers in making informed choices and contribute to a fulfilling and rewarding career.   Best of Luck!

column1: Customer Care Executive - Sales - E Commerce
column2: Roles and Responsibilities     Customer care professionals are responsible for addressing customer inquiries and concerns, whether it be through phone, email, or chat support. They must respond to customer inquiries promptly and professionally, providing accurate and helpful information.  Resolving customer complaints. They must work to find a satisfactory solution for the customer while adhering to company policies and procedures. Must accurately record all customer interactions, including complaints, inquiries, and resolutions, using relevant software or customer relationship management (CRM) systems. Must stay up-to-date with the latest products, services, and policies of the company. This will enable them to provide accurate and helpful information to customers. Collaborating and work closely with other departments, such as sales and marketing, to ensure a seamless customer experience. They may also be responsible for escalating issues to other departments if necessary. Customer care professionals are often required to meet performance targets such as customer satisfaction ratings, call handling times, and response times. Desired Candidate Profile      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Active listening and problem-solving abilities Patience, empathy, and the ability to handle difficult customers with tact and professionalism Attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and record-keeping Ability to work under pressure and manage time effectively Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) systems and other relevant software programs Bilingual or multilingual abilities may be an asset in some industries Sales or marketing experience may also be an asset Qualification : -  Graduation or equivalent Post-secondary education in a related field may be an asset Relevant certifications or training programs may be required depending on the industry Perks and Benefits   Friendly work environment  Office Timing : 10.30 a.m. to 7.30 p.m. Location :   Vile Parle West

column1: Opening For Sales Executive with Fareportal
column2: Company Overview Fareportal is a travel technology company powering a next-generation travel concierge service. Utilizing its innovative technology and company owned and operated global contact centers, Fareportal has built strong industry partnerships providing customers access to over 600 airlines, a million lodgings, and hundreds of car rental companies around the globe. With a portfolio of consumer travel brands including CheapOair and OneTravel, Fareportal enables consumers to book-online, on mobile apps for iOS and Android, by phone, or live chat. Fareportal provides its airline partners with access to a broad customer base that books high-yielding international travel and add-on ancillaries.  Fareportal is one of the leading sellers of airline tickets in the United States. We are a progressive company that leverages technology and expertise to deliver optimal solutions for our suppliers, customers, and partners. FAREPORTAL HIGHLIGHTS: Fareportal is the number 1 privately held online travel company in flight volume.  Fareportal partners with over 600 airlines, 1 million lodgings, and hundreds of car rental companies worldwide.  2019 annual sales exceeded $5 billion.  Fareportal sees over 150 million unique visitors annually to our desktop and mobile sites. Fareportal, with its global workforce of over 2,600 employees, is strategically positioned with 9 offices in 6 countries and headquartered in New York City.  Role Overview As a Sales Representative you will play a pivotal role in Fareportal's business. This role offers someone the chance to really develop their sales career through training and development while supporting and learning from the sales team. The role is Full-time working the night shifts 5 days per week, work from Office. Responsibilities Sales representative should be able to understand companys products and services and their advantages and disadvantages. And should be able to quickly address customer concerns and questions and overcome potential roadblocks in the sales cycle. Must meet KPIs to ensure optimal productivity and efficiency. Would be responsible to meet revenue goals and other key KPIs. Frequently deal with difficult prospects and passengers, but they must remain driven and positive even in the face of adversity to transform leads into sales. Sales representatives are personable communicators who clearly and persuasively describe products and services to passengers to encourage sales transactions. Demonstrates a clear understanding of policies and procedures of operation; complies with and applies policies and effectively applies new work methods, skills to complete work. Requirement Graduate with Min. 9 Months of International Sales experience(Voice Process), Travel Sales is Preferable. Previous working experience as an Outbound Sales/ Inbound Sales/Inbound Up Sell for International market. Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills. Open to work 24/7 as per business requirement. Advanced GDS Experience(Sabre/Amadeus) is desirable.

column1: Policy Bazaar is Hiring For UAE Sales Process II?Day?Shift ||
column2: Interested Candidates may connect with their Interest Level to Ms.Gurpreet Kaur +91-98772-25369   (11am-5pm)   Company Overview: Policy Bazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace in India, offering a wide range of insurance products and services to customers worldwide. We are currently seeking motivated individuals to join our team as Associate Sales Consultants for NRI clients. Job Summary: As an  Associate Sales Consultant  for UAE clients, you will be responsible for tele-sales and providing insurance solutions to Non-Resident Indians (NRIs). Your primary focus will be on understanding the insurance needs of UAE clients and offering suitable insurance products to meet their requirements. You will be working on different processes based on the region, time zone, and preferences of the clients.   Position:  Associate Sales Consultant- UAE Clients  (Day Shifts) Location:  Gurugram, Haryana, India Job Responsibilities: Reach out to UAE clients through telesales and effectively communicate the benefits of our insurance products. Understand the insurance needs of UAE clients and provide suitable recommendations based on their requirements. Build rapport and establish long-term relationships with UAE clients to ensure customer satisfaction and maximize up-selling opportunities. Achieve sales targets and meet or exceed key performance indicators (KPIs) set for the UAE sales process. Handle customer inquiries, address concerns, and provide accurate information about insurance policies. Update customer details and interactions in the company's CRM system. Collaborate with team members and sales managers to develop strategies for achieving sales goals. Stay updated with insurance products, industry trends, and regulations to effectively serve NRI clients. Adhere to company policies, guidelines, and code of conduct. Interested leads will be provided by the company. No cold calling or random calling.   Job Requirements: Minimum qualification: Graduation (Any specialization) Prior experience in telesales or customer service is preferred. Excellent communication skills in English. Knowledge of insurance products and services is a plus. Ability to understand the insurance needs of UAE clients and offer suitable solutions. Flexible to work in different shifts based on the process requirements. Strong interpersonal skills and ability to build relationships with clients. Self-motivated with a strong drive to achieve targets and earn incentives. Basic computer skills and familiarity with CRM software is a plus. Salary and Benefits: Salary range: Up to 4.0 LPA based on experience and performance. Attractive incentives based on meeting or exceeding sales targets. Shift Timing will 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM Six Days working days with a fixed weekly off. Join Policy Bazaar and become a part of our dynamic sales team, where you can leverage your sales skills, serve NRI clients, and grow your career in the insurance industry. Best of Luck!

column2: Interested candidates may connect with Ms.Srishti Sachdeva-+91 90279-54483   (11am-5 pm)     About Policybazaar.com:  Policybazaar.com is India's largest online insurance aggregator, dedicated to helping individuals make informed decisions about their insurance needs. We offer a wide range of insurance products and services, providing our customers with easy access to the best insurance plans available in the market.   Job Summary:  Policybazaar.com is looking for dynamic and motivated male individuals to join our International Inbound Sales Process team. This is an excellent opportunity for both freshers and experienced professionals in the same domain to enhance their careers. Candidates with prior sales experience will receive an added advantage.   Responsibilities: Inbound Sales:  Handle inbound sales inquiries from international customers and provide them with comprehensive information about insurance products and services. Customer Engagement:  Build and maintain positive relationships with customers, addressing their queries, concerns, and providing effective solutions. Location:  Must be willing to work in Gurugram, Haryana. Interview:  Face-to-face interviews will be conducted.   What We Offer: Competitive salary package (up to 4.5 LPA). 6 days working with rotational Off. Extensive training and development opportunities. Career growth prospects within a fast-growing company. A positive and dynamic work environment. Employee benefits and incentives.   If you are enthusiastic, have a passion for sales, and want to be part of a leading company in the insurance sector, we encourage you to apply! Join Policybazaar.com and embark on a rewarding career in the world of insurance sales.   Best of Luck!

The company is dedicated to simplifying the insurance buying process and empowering customers with the knowledge and tools to make informed decisions. Your role will involve interacting with domestic/international customers, understanding their health insurance needs, and guiding them through the process of selecting and purchasing suitable health insurance plans. You will be the face of PolicyBazaar, ensuring exceptional customer service and building long-lasting relationships.   About Health Insurance Scheme: Health insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection against medical expenses incurred due to illnesses, injuries, or hospitalization. These schemes offer coverage for various medical treatments, including hospitalization costs, surgical expenses, diagnostic tests, and more. Health insurance plans can be customized based on individual or family requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive health insurance plan can help mitigate the financial burden of medical emergencies and ensure access to quality healthcare services.   Key Responsibilities: - Handle inbound calls from domestic/international customers with professionalism and courtesy. - Understand customers' inquiries, concerns, and requirements related to health insurance products. - Provide accurate and relevant information about health insurance products, policies, and services offered by Policybazaar.com. - Assist customers in navigating the Policybazaar.com platform to compare and select suitable health insurance options. - Address customer queries and concerns effectively, ensuring a satisfactory resolution to their issues. - Educate customers about various health insurance plans and help them make informed decisions. - Maintain a high level of customer service by adhering to established processes and quality standards. - Document customer interactions and feedback for continuous improvement of services. - Collaborate with team members and contribute to a positive and supportive work environment.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the health insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging and varied customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of health insurance products and terminology is preferred. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Compensation and Benefits: - CTC from 3.0 LPA to 4.5 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package   Working Hours: - Day shift only   Selection Process: - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column2: Interested Candidates may connect with their Interest Level to Ms.Afreen Manzoor- +91-93206-13279   About the Client Policy bazaar was founded in 2008 with one objective: bringing transparency in insurance. The founders wanted to reimaging insurance, so they started by simplifying all the information around plans, ending the rampant mis-selling, and preventing policy lapses. Today, we are India's best & largest online insurance marketplace. Over  9+ million (90 lakh+)  individuals have come to us & bought the best insurance plans from the top insurers in the country. We have sold over  19 million policies  since inception, and this number is only growing. While we are happy with how we are changing insurance for the country, we know there is still a lot of work to be done. Our vision to bring pioneering technologies & innovations to the field continues to grow. We aspire to build a health & financial safety net for more households in India in the coming years. Lead Verification     : Verify the authenticity and accuracy of leads by confirming contact information, educational interests, and other relevant details.             Data Entry and Management     : Record all interactions and updates in the excel sheet or CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system accurately and promptly.             Follow-Up Calls     : Conduct follow-up calls with leads to nurture them through the enrolment process, address any queries or concerns they may have, and encourage them to take the next steps. Building Rapport     : Build rapport and establish a positive relationship with leads to enhance their trust and confidence in the educational institution.             Handling Objections     : Address objections and concerns raised by leads effectively, providing appropriate solutions or information to alleviate doubts and objections.             Appointment Setting     : Schedule appointments for prospective students with admissions counsellors or other relevant personnel as required.             Meeting Targets     : Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly targets for lead verification, follow-up calls, and conversion rates.             Team Collaboration     : Collaborate with other team members such as admissions counsellors, marketing professionals, and administrative staff to ensure a seamless enrolment process for prospective students.             Feedback Provision     : Provide feedback to the management regarding the quality of leads, effectiveness of communication strategies, and any areas for improvement in the lead verification process.             Adherence to Guidelines     : Adhere to the organization s guidelines, policies, and compliance standards during all interactions with leads.             Continuous Learning     : Stay updated with information about the educational institution, its programs, industry trends, and best practices in tele calling and lead verification. column2: Responsibilities of a Tele Sales Executive: Outbound calling: Contact potential customers to introduce them to the company's offerings and generate interest. Inbound calls: Address inquiries from existing or potential customers about products or services. Qualifying leads: Ask questions to understand customer needs and determine if they are a good fit for the company's offerings. Making presentations: Effectively communicate the features and benefits of the products or services to convince customers to buy. Closing sales: Negotiate deals and close sales transactions over the phone. Customer service: Provide excellent customer service by answering questions, resolving complaints, and handling returns. Data entry: Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales data. Meeting targets: Strive to achieve or exceed assigned sales targets. Languages Required: English, Kannada and Hindi Day shift. Qualification: Degree Mandatory  Experience: 6 months1 year exp into insurance Sales.

column2: We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Telesales Representative to join our sales team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for generating leads, contacting potential customers over the phone, and closing sales deals. Responsibilities: 1. Conduct outbound calls to potential customers from provided leads or databases. 2. Present, promote, and sell products/services using persuasive sales techniques. 3. Understand customer needs and requirements to offer tailored solutions. 4. Maintain accurate records of calls, sales, and customer interactions in the CRM system. 5. Follow up on leads and inquiries to ensure customer satisfaction and retention. 6. Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets and KPIs. 7. Collaborate with the sales team to strategize on improving sales techniques and processes. 8. Stay updated with product knowledge, industry trends, and competitor activities. 9. Provide excellent customer service to build and maintain strong relationships with clients. 10. Participate in sales meetings, training sessions, and team activities as required. Requirements: 1. Proven experience in telesales or sales-related roles. 2. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. 3. Strong persuasive and interpersonal abilities. 4. Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment and handle rejection professionally. 5. Results-oriented with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. 6. Familiarity with CRM software and sales processes. 7. Graduation; additional qualifications in sales or marketing is a plus. 8. Ability to work independently as well as part of a team. 9. Positive attitude, resilience, and a desire to learn and grow professionally. 10. Availability to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends if required. Benefits: 1. Competitive salary and commission structure. 2. Ongoing training and career development opportunities. 3. Health insurance and other benefits. 4. Friendly and supportive work environment. 5. Opportunity to work with a diverse and talented sales team.

The primary responsibilities of a Telecaller Executive are:         Contacting potential or existing customers through calls and explaining the products or services offered by the company. Achieving daily or weekly call targets.     Recording call logs, customer interactions, and other relevant information.     Following up with customers after the initial call to ensure customer satisfaction and resolve any remaining issues.     Maintaining a professional and courteous manner while dealing with customers.     Staying updated on the latest product and industry knowledge.     Collaborating with other departments to resolve customer issues and improve customer experience. column1: Niva Bupa is hiring For Renewals Associates II CTC upto 3.5LPA
column2: Interested candidates can coordinate with Recruiters for fixing interview (10AM -5PM) HR Connect-MS.   Raminder Kohli, at +91-93546-48803   (11am-5pm)   Niva Bupa Health Insurance Company Ltd. (Niva Bupa) is a joint venture between True North, a leading Indian private equity firm, and the UK based healthcare services expert, Bupa. Our vision is, To become India's most admired Health Insurance Company. And to make this vision a reality, we have brought together the vast and varied experience as the experts in healthcare of Bupa and the Insights and understanding of the healthcare market and transformational business capability of True North. While Bupa has six decades of experience in the healthcare industry and a 29 million customer-base in over 190 countries; True North is a leading Indian private equity firm, with a focus on investing in and transforming mid-sized profitable businesses into world-class industry leaders. In the last 20 years, True North has invested in more than 50 Indian businesses and has successfully guided these companies in making the transition into well-established and large businesses that are valuable, enduring, and socially responsible. At Niva Bupa, our mission is to help our customers live healthier and more successful lives by providing expertise as healthcare partners. And this, we realize is only possible by constantly raising the bar in the standard of health insurance and by keeping our promises to you, our customer and caring for you, for life. Position Titles:  Renewals Associates Reports to:  Team Leader Function:  Operations Job Location:  Noida   Job Description Selling of Health Insurance Products to the leads given by the company. Interested leads will be provided by the company. No cold calling or random calling. Leads will be from interested customers. Day shift - Fixed timings. Its a 6 days working company. Roaster off Only. Fixed salary + High incentives. Office location at Noida Sector-59. Other monetary incentives to the employees (confidential)   Knowledge, Skills and Attitude: Ability to work under Pressure. Should have very good convincing and selling skills. Should have good English communication skills. Graduate/P.G./MBA will be preferred. Should be very confident and presentable. Fresher is allowed. Graduate is Mandotary. Energy levels should be high.   Experience Required: 0-6 Months experience in any outbound Insurance sales/Service/Renewals. Telesales experience in Health Insurance products will be an added advantage. Compensation & Benefits:  Rs. 260000 - Rs. 350000 (CTC) per Annum + Incentives; will be decided based on qualification, experience and interview. ESIC, PF & Gratuity, as per applicable law. Group Insurance, Cover.
