column2: Interested Candidates may connect with Ms.   Komal Saxena : - 9758-000-279     We are Paisabazaar.com -  India`s No. 1 Marketplace for Loans and Credit Cards. Our aim is to make personal finance decisions easy, convenient and transparent for our customers. In less than three years, we have become the largest aggregator platform for lending products (in terms of disbursals as per industry estimates). Loans worth Rs 2500 crore are disbursed through the Paisabazaar platform annually. Paisabazaar.com is your one-stop destination for all types of loans, cards and investment products in India. We help you compare and choose from various financial products across categories such as personal loans, home loans, credit cards, education loans, car loans, savings accounts and mutual funds. We work with over 90 partners that include India`s leading banks, NBFCs and mutual fund houses with operations that span over 250 cities across the country and offer more than 200 financial products.   Position Title:  Associates Sales Consultants Reports to:  Team Leader Function:  Operations Location:  Gurgaon, Haryana, India   Job Description Selling of Loan related products to the leads given by the company. Interested leads will be provided by the company. No cold calling or random calling. Leads will be from interested customers. Day shift (10am to 7:00pm) - Fixed timings. Its a 6 days working company. The candidates will be given 1 weekly off as per the roster which means there will be no fixed off. Fixed salary + High incentives. Office location at 10 minutes walking distance from Huda City Center Metro Station. Other monetary incentives to the employees (confidential)   Applicant Eligibility:   Telesales experience in loans/Financial Products sales will be a added advantage. Graduates/Post-Graduates/MBA with 0-3 year of experience in relevant field can apply for a better salary & Future.   Knowledge, Skills and Attitude: Should have very good convincing and selling skills. Should have good English communication skills. Graduate/P.G./MBA will be preferred. Should be very confident and presentable. Fresher also welcome Energy levels should be high   Qualification and Experience:  MBA/PG/Graduate/Undergraduates   Compensation & Benefits:  Rs. 15,000 - Rs. 23,000(CTC) per Month + Incentives; will be decided based on qualification, experience and interview. column1: Hiring For Insurance Sales Associate Max CTC up To 2.5LPA II Day Shift
column2: Interested candidates may connect with Ms.Monisha kundu -+91-81001-60812   About Globiva. Globiva Services Private Limited is a dynamic and fast-growing organization in the insurance sector, committed to providing comprehensive insurance solutions to our clients. We are looking for dedicated and enthusiastic individuals to join our team as Insurance Sales Associates (ASC Profile). Whether you are a fresher or an experienced professional, we welcome your talent and potential to contribute to our ongoing success.   Job Overview: As an Insurance Tele-Sales representative at Globiva Services Private Limited, you will play a crucial role in promoting and selling  Financial products . We are committed to providing our clients with the best Financial solutions without engaging in cold calling. Your primary responsibility will be to engage with potential clients, assess their Financial needs, and present them with the most suitable Financial options. This role offers a competitive salary and the chance to work in a supportive and dynamic environment.   Key Responsibilities: Pre-qualified leads for financial products will be given. No Cold Calling. Engage with potential clients to understand their financial needs and provide relevant information. Offer solutions that align with the client's requirements and financial goals. Explain policy features, benefits, and terms to clients, ensuring they make informed decisions. Maintain accurate records of client interactions and sales activities in the company's database. Meet or exceed sales targets and objectives set by the company. Provide exceptional customer service and address client inquiries and concerns. Keep up-to-date with industry knowledge and product offerings. Collaborate with team members and management to continuously improve sales strategies.   Requirements: Fresher and Experienced candidates in the same domain can apply. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong persuasive and negotiation abilities. Ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment. Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office applications. A self-motivated and goal-oriented approach to sales.   Additional Requirements: Maximum Salary: Up to 20,000 INR CTC based on previous salary and experience. Job Type: Full-time, Permanent Working Hours: Day shift only Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong negotiation and persuasion abilities. Self-motivated and goal-oriented. Basic computer skills. Customer-centric approach.   Interview Process: The interview process will be a combination of virtual and face-to-face interviews.   Best of   Luck!

column2: Key Skills:    E RP Sales, Direct Sales, Software Sales, Communication Skills, Retail Sales, Problem Solving, Business Development, Software Solution Sales, Sales Executive Activities, CRM       We are looking for an enthusiastic Telesales Executive to contribute in generating sales leads for our company. You will be responsible for software demo fixing over the phone and maintaining good customer relationships.     An effective telesales executive must be an excellent communicator and have superior people skills. They must be comfortable presenting products or services over the phone.     The goal is to help the company grow by bringing in customers to see the demo of our software.     Roles and Responsibilities:             Contact potential or existing customers to inform them about a product or service using scripts     Answer questions about products or the company     Ask questions to understand customer requirements and close sales     Direct prospects to the field sales team when needed     Enter and update customer information in the database     Take and process orders in an accurate manner     Handle grievances to preserve the company s reputation     Go the extra mile to meet sales quota and facilitate future sales     Keep records of calls and sales and note useful information             Required telesales executive having 2-4 years of experience preferably in Software Solutions.     Desired Candidate Profile:             Proven experience as telesales representative or other sales/customer service role     Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quota preferably over the phone     Good knowledge of relevant computer programs (e.g. CRM software) and telephone systems     Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects     Excellent knowledge of English     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills     Cool-tempered and able to handle rejection     Outstanding negotiation skills with the ability to resolve issues and address complaints     Qualification: Graduation                 ?

column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To fix up the interview schedule (F2F),  Pl connect   Ms.   Shikha Sharma- +91-87000-43971     Important Checklist before Applying- Only Graduate Candidates may apply. Only Male Candidates may apply. A Minimum 08 months of sales experience is must. Telesales experience will be preferred. Two Wheeler is must. Average English speaking efficiency. Proficiency in local language (Telugu). Only Interview will be virtually, Need to work from office only. Need to join at Hitech City Hyderabad. Prior experience in the Insurance domain is not mandatory. Male Candidates might have to travel to the field to materialize the leads.  Travel Allowance will be paid. Corona Vaccinated profiles will be preferred. Joining Period will be not more than 10 Days.  About policy Bazaar.com   Policy Bazaar was founded in 2008 with one objective: bringing transparency in insurance. The founders wanted to reimaging insurance, so they started by simplifying all the information around plans, ending the rampant mis-selling, and preventing policy lapses. Today, we are India's best & largest online insurance marketplace. Over  9+ million (90 lakh+)  individuals have come to us & bought the best insurance plans from the top insurers in the country. We have sold over  19 million policies  since inception, and this number is only growing. While we are happy with how we are changing insurance for the country, we know there is still a lot of work to be done. Our vision to bring pioneering technologies & innovations to the field continues to grow. We aspire to build a health & financial safety net for more households in India in the coming years.   Position Title: Associate Sales Consultants Languages required - English/ Telugu Reports to:  Team Leader  Function:  Operations  Location: Hitech City, Hyderabad   Applicant Eligibility:  Graduates/Post-Graduates/MBA (Preferred) with 1-2 years of experience in relevant field can apply for a better salary & Future.      Job Description   Selling of financial Products/Insurance Policy to the leads given by the company. Interested leads will be provided by the company. No cold calling or random calling. Leads will be from interested customers. Day shift (10 am to 7:00 pm) - Fixed timings. It's a 6-days working company. The candidates will be given 1 week off as per the roster which means there will be no fixed off. Fixed salary + High incentives. Other monetary incentives to the employees (confidential) Knowledge, Skills and Attitude:   Should have very good convincing and selling skills. Should have good Regional communication skills. Graduate/P.G./MBA will be preferred. Should be very confident and presentable. Fresher also welcome Energy levels should be high Qualification and Experience:  MBA/PG/Graduate  Compensation & Benefits:  Rs. 20,000 - Rs. 30,000(CTC) per Month + Incentives; will be decided based on qualification, experience and interview. ESIC, PF & Gratuity, as per applicable law. Group Insurance, Cover.        Best Of Luck !

column2: A Tele Calling Executive, also known as a Telecaller or Telemarketer, is responsible for making outbound calls to potential or existing customers with the aim of promoting products, services, or campaigns, and generating sales or leads      The job description of a Tele Calling Executive typically includes the following:Outbound Calling: Initiate outbound calls to prospective customers or existing clients using a provided list or database      This involves following a script or set of talking points to present information, address customer inquiries, or conduct surveys      Customer Engagement: Engage customers in conversations to build rapport, understand their needs, and identify opportunities for cross-selling or upselling products or services      Actively listen to customers, provide accurate information, and offer solutions to their queries or concerns      Product/Service Promotion: Effectively communicate the features, benefits, and unique selling points of the products or services being offered      Highlight promotional offers, discounts, or incentives to create interest and generate leads or sales      Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential leads through effective questioning and conversation techniques      Gather customer information, such as contact details, preferences, or requirements, and maintain accurate records in a CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system      Sales Target Achievement: Work towards achieving individual or team-based sales targets or objectives      Follow established sales processes, overcome objections, and strive to convert leads into confirmed sales or appointments      Follow-up and Relationship Management: Maintain regular follow-up with customers to nurture relationships, provide additional information, address concerns, or offer ongoing support      Keep accurate records of customer interactions and update the CRM system accordingly
column11: CVS, Recruitment Executive, Telecalling Executive, Sales

column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Globiva   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Srishti Sachdeva- +91-90279-54483   Job Overview: Globiva is seeking a driven and enthusiastic  Sales Associate  to join our team in Gurgaon! In this role, you will play a key part in our E-commerce process, helping customers navigate the platform and ultimately convert their interest into purchases.   Responsibilities: Assist customers with browsing and selecting products on E-commerce Site. Clearly explain product features and benefits, ensuring customers understand the value proposition. Guide customers through various payment options, including debit/credit cards, net banking, and COD. Explain EMI options and help customers choose the best payment plan for their needs. Focus on converting "add to cart" items into confirmed purchases. Provide excellent customer service, ensuring a positive and informative experience. Identify customer needs and recommend complementary products (cross-selling) or upgrades to better suit their requirements (upselling)   Qualifications: Minimum 6 months of experience in sales, preferably in a similar e-commerce environment. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with customers. Excellent product knowledge and the ability to explain features in a clear and concise manner. Proficient in computer skills and comfortable navigating the Flipkart platform. A target-oriented and results-driven individual with a passion for exceeding customer expectations.   Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package (depending on experience) upto 26K CTC Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment Be part of a growing team and contribute to the success of Flipkart sales Day shifts with 6 days working   If you're a motivated and sales-oriented individual with a passion for customer service, we encourage you to apply!

column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associates For Orion-EB process ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Khushboo Gupta: -+91 89581-10044     Role Overview: As an  Associate Sales Consultant  in the Orion-EB team, you will be responsible for selling insurance products and employee benefits solutions to corporate clients for their employees. Your primary focus will be to engage with Finance/HR heads (CFOs, CHROs) of large organizations, understand their requirements for employee insurance and benefits, and provide tailored insurance solutions through PolicyBazaar's offerings.   Orion-EB Process:  The Orion-EB process involves engaging with corporate clients to understand their requirements for providing comprehensive employee insurance and benefits solutions to their workforce. This includes conducting in-depth needs analysis, gathering detailed requirements from Finance/HR heads, and understanding the organization's specific pain points, budget constraints, and goals related to employee benefits. You will be responsible for positioning PolicyBazaar's offerings as the ideal solution, highlighting the advantages of group insurance plans, employee wellness programs, and other relevant benefits. The role requires building strong relationships with key decision-makers, effectively addressing their concerns, and guiding them through the entire sales process until the successful implementation of the chosen solutions.   Key Responsibilities: ??Identify and approach potential corporate clients for employee insurance and benefits solutions. ??Conduct needs analysis and gather requirements from Finance/HR heads. ??Develop and present tailored insurance solutions leveraging PolicyBazaar's offerings. ??Maintain engagement with clients throughout the sales cycle. ??Collaborate with internal teams for smooth implementation of solutions. ??Achieve and exceed assigned sales targets while ensuring client satisfaction.   Required Qualifications and Skills: ??Excellent communication and presentation skills. ??Proven experience in selling insurance or employee benefits solutions to corporate clients. ??Strong negotiation skills and ability to influence decision-makers. ??Exceptional active listening and consultative approach. ??Ability to build rapport and establish long-lasting client relationships. ??Proficiency in using CRM tools and relevant software applications. ??Self-motivated and driven, with a commitment to achieving sales targets. ??Presentable and professional appearance, reflecting PolicyBazaar's brand values. ??Knowledge of relevant statutory regulations and industry best practices. Existing network and relationships with potential corporate clients.   Compensation & Benefits: Maximum CTC will be  4.00 LPA  + Incentives; will be decided based on qualification, experience and interview. ESIC, PF & Gratuity, as per applicable law. Group Insurance, Cover.

column2: We are looking for a talented and motivated Inside Sales Executive to join our Inside Sales team. As a Tele-caller, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential customers, promoting our products/services, and generating leads. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 1 year of experience in the Tele-calling field and possess excellent communication skills in English. Responsibilities: Make 100 to 120 outbound calls to potential customers from provided contact lists. Introduce our products/services to prospects and provide information about their benefits and features. Engage with customers courteously and professionally to build rapport and generate interest in our offerings. Identify and qualify sales leads by gathering relevant information from the prospects. Set up appointments or schedule follow-up calls for the sales team with interested prospects. Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of calls made and outcomes in the CRM system or call log. Handle customer objections and address their concerns effectively, aiming to convert prospects into qualified leads. Achieve individual and team targets for lead generation and call quality. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to align efforts and share valuable customer insights. Stay informed about our products/services, industry trends, and competitor offerings to provide accurate information to customers. Continuously improve personal knowledge and skills through training, workshops, or self-learning. Requirements: Minimum of 1 year of experience in the Tele-calling field, preferably in a sales or lead generation role. Proven track record of achieving targets and generating leads. Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. Pleasant and persuasive telephone etiquette with the ability to engage customers in conversations. Strong active listening skills and the ability to identify customer needs. Ability to handle objections and professionally resolve customer concerns. The results-oriented mindset with a drive to meet and exceed targets. Familiarity with CRM systems or call centre software is a plus. Good organizational and time management skills. Ability to work independently while being a team player. Join our dynamic and growing team and contribute to our lead-generation efforts through effective tele-calling. If you meet the above requirements and are ready to take on this exciting opportunity, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and achievements in the Tele-calling field.   if you are interested Please contact - 95380 0033 or drop the resume at careers@royaloakindia.com

column1: Sales Team Lead || BPO || Immeddiate Joinner
column2: A Sales Team Leader (TL) plays a crucial role in managing and motivating a sales team to achieve targets and drive revenue growth. Here's an overview of the responsibilities typically associated with this role: 1. **Team Management**: A Sales TL oversees a team of sales representatives, providing guidance, support, and mentorship to help them perform at their best. This involves setting clear expectations, monitoring performance, and conducting regular one-on-one meetings to provide feedback and address any concerns. 2. **Sales Strategy**: Sales TLs often collaborate with upper management to develop sales strategies and set targets aligned with the company's objectives. They may also participate in strategic planning sessions to identify opportunities for growth and improvement. 3. **Training and Development**: Sales TLs are responsible for training new hires and ensuring that existing team members receive ongoing training to enhance their skills and knowledge. This could involve organizing workshops, role-playing exercises, or providing access to relevant resources and materials. 4. **Performance Monitoring**: Sales TLs track key performance metrics such as sales revenue, conversion rates, and customer satisfaction scores. They use this data to evaluate individual and team performance, identify areas for improvement, and implement corrective actions when necessary. 5. **Motivation and Recognition**: Maintaining a positive and motivating work environment is essential for keeping the sales team engaged and productive. Sales TLs often organize incentives, contests, or recognition programs to reward top performers and boost morale. 6. **Customer Relationship Management**: While individual sales representatives focus on building relationships with clients, Sales TLs may oversee higher-level customer relationships, especially with key accounts or strategic partners. 7. **Reporting and Analysis**: Sales TLs generate regular reports on team performance, sales forecasts, and market trends to keep upper management informed and make data-driven decisions. They may also conduct competitive analysis to identify strengths, weaknesses, and opportunities in the market. 8. **Conflict Resolution**: Inevitably, conflicts may arise within the sales team or between team members and clients. Sales TLs need strong interpersonal skills to resolve disputes effectively and maintain positive relationships both internally and externally. Overall, a successful Sales Team Leader is someone who can inspire and motivate their team to achieve results, while also providing the necessary support and guidance to help them succeed in a competitive sales environment.

We are a group of self-driven, motivated individuals who enjoy taking ownership and believe in providing best value for money to investors through innovative products and investment strategies. column2: About Info Edge  InfoEdges mission is to create world-class platforms that transform lives by continuously innovating. Our products and services are built keeping our customers in mind. We always delight our customers by delivering superior value through enhanced offerings on the internet and other platforms. Through our continuous investment across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), we have built a robust system that constantly increases our predictive powers on customer behaviour, and optimizes and improves our systems. Our various teams tirelessly work together to solve problems, innovate, and create something to empower our customers. At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent. About BU: Shiksha.com  Shiksha.com is an online platform that helps students find in-depth information about colleges, courses and exams. It also enables students to interact with domain experts and college/school alumni towards taking exam, course-selection and college-selection related decisions. It has a repository of reliable and authentic information for over 15,000 institutions, 1,40,000 plus courses and gets over 70 million unique visitors per year. Shiksha provides leads of relevant students to Universities and Colleges seeking to admit those students in their courses Title:  Executive/Senior Executive  Required Educational Qualification:  Any Graduation or Any Post Graduation Desired Experience:  1 - 3 years Job Objective:  The objective is to loop in prospective students to apply for education loan through our partnered loan service providers via outbound calls. Job Description:    Dedicated calling on prospect leads and pitch to take education loan through us  Follow up with students to arrange all documentation required for education loan  Create a file of documents as per defined checklist and share with partnered loan service providers  Coordinate with our partnered loan service providers for processing of education loan   Maintain MIS and database of qualified leads for effective tracking and overall progress Required Skills :  Sales orientation   Basic knowledge about education and other types of loan and their respective ROI (rate of interest)  Excellent communication skills both verbal and written  Data Orientation Desired Skills :  Customer centric approach   Inside sales experience in the education domain or any finance related product (insurance, credit card etc.)  Good convincing skills  Excellent selling skills Why Join Us: This is a unique opportunity to work on innovative and disruptive technology driven business solutions, that are shaping the future of the industry. We are looking for candidates who are willing to work passionately in a fast-paced environment and are ready to enhance their skills by learning something new. Being a part of InfoEdge, will allow you to unleash your potential and carve your own career. To learn more about Info Edge visit http://www.infoedge.in

column1: Back office On line Sales Executive/ Telecaller
column2: Role & responsibilities     Job Overview: As an Online Sales Executive for generic medicine (Back Office), you will be responsible for supporting the online sales operations of our company. You will work behind the scenes to ensure the smooth functioning of our online sales platforms, manage customer inquiries and orders, and contribute to the overall success of our e-commerce sales efforts. Your role will involve coordinating with various teams to optimize the online sales process, provide excellent customer service, and drive revenue growth through online channels. Key Responsibilities: Online Sales Support: Assist in the development and implementation of online sales strategies to drive revenue growth and achieve sales targets. Monitor online sales performance metrics, analyze trends, and identify opportunities for improvement to enhance the online shopping experience and increase conversion rates. 1.To generate sales order from customer through mobile app, web portal and GOBP partner. 2.To call customers and punch monthly sales order  3.To take follow up on monthly basis on order from all online partners. 4.To punch sales order in CS portals. 5. To achieve monthly sales target and to generate sales order. Order Processing and Management: Handle incoming online orders promptly and accurately, ensuring timely processing and fulfillment. Coordinate with the warehouse and logistics teams to ensure efficient order management, inventory availability, and timely delivery to customers. 1.To ask customer to upload valid doctor prescription and send it to hub. 2.To convince the customers to place the order and to build up the same strategy for future endeavors. 3.To recruit new GOBP franchisee explain them about the app, teach them to place the orders. Customer Service and Support: Respond to customer inquiries, requests, and complaints received through online channels, including email, chat, and social media platforms. To greet customer and build rapport and strong relationship with customer, clients. 4.After placing the order to keep follow up with customers Content Management: Maintain product listings, descriptions, and pricing information on our e-commerce platforms, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and compliance with brand guidelines. Collaborate with marketing and product teams to update product images, promotions, and other content to optimize online visibility and sales conversion. Data Analysis and Reporting: Compile and analyze data related to online sales performance, customer behavior, and market trends to generate insights and recommendations for optimization. Prepare regular reports and dashboards to track key performance indicators (KPIs), monitor sales trends, and evaluate the effectiveness of online sales strategies and initiatives. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, customer service, logistics, and IT, to streamline processes, address issues, and drive continuous improvement in online sales operations. Provide feedback and insights from online sales activities to inform product development, marketing campaigns, and customer engagement strategies.  Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, E-commerce, or related field. Previous experience in e-commerce, online sales, customer service, or related roles is advantageous but not required. Perks and benefits   Best In Industry

Benefits: Competitive salary package with attractive incentives based on performance. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within the company. column2: The Job Role and Responsibilities: A telesales executive is generally a part of the company's sales team and his/her primary job is to sell. Telesales executives have set targets and strategies by their team supervisor. They would mostly be calling a prospective client and persuading them to either purchase/trial a product/service, or accept a visit from another sales team member. Telesales executives must have a clear understanding of the product/service they are selling and should be able to negotiate well. Competencies and Skills Required : A telesales executive is required to interact with customers for most part of his/her day and so good communication skills are a must. He/she must be able to plan the number of fresh/follow-up calls he/she has to do in order to meet targets. The job also requires good selling and persuading skills and also a thorough understanding of the company's offerings. The major skills and competencies that employers look for are : - Good spoken and written language skills - Ability to plan and execute - Ability to persuade and negotiate - Ability to work under stress - Ability to work as a team Assessment for the 'Right' Telesales Executive Telesales Executive Profile AMCAT Mapping Communication Skills SVAR (Spoken English): High Agreeableness: Mid to High Good Sales and Negotiation Skills SVAR (Spoken English): High Extraversion: Mid Emotional Stability: Mid Ability to plan and execute Conscientiousness: Mid to High Ability to Work under stress Emotional Stability: Mid to High Team Work & Co-ordination Agreeableness: Mid to High Emotional Stability: Mid

column2: Tendering Procedures     Bid Management      Communication      Analytical      Contract Review     Relationship Management      Time Management     Attention to Detail         Job Description           We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Tendering Executive to join our organization     The Tendering Executive will be responsible for managing the end-to-end tender process, including identifying opportunities, preparing and submitting bids, and coordinating with internal teams to ensure timely and accurate completion of tender documents     This role requires excellent communication skills, strong analytical abilities, and a thorough understanding of tendering procedures         Responsibilities:         Tender Identification: Monitor and research tender opportunities through various sources, including government portals, industry websites, and publications. Identify relevant tenders that align with the company?? capabilities and objectives.     Bid Preparation: Prepare and compile tender documents in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender documents. This includes reviewing and analyzing tender specifications, preparing technical and commercial proposals, and ensuring compliance with all necessary documentation.     Coordinate Internal Teams: Collaborate with internal stakeholders, such as sales, engineering, legal, and finance departments, to gather the required information and resources for tender submissions. Ensure effective communication and coordination to meet deadlines and address any queries or concerns.     Documentation Management: Maintain an organized and up-to-date database of tender documents, including past tenders, templates, and supporting materials. Ensure accuracy and completeness of all documentation for future reference and audits.     Compliance and Quality Assurance: Ensure all tender submissions comply with legal and regulatory requirements, as well as company policies and procedures. Perform quality checks on tender documents to minimize errors and maximize chances of success.     Competitive Analysis: Conduct market research and competitor analysis to understand industry trends, pricing strategies, and customer requirements. Utilize this information to enhance the company?? competitive position in tender submissions.     Contract Review: Assist in reviewing and negotiating contract terms and conditions for successful tenders. Collaborate with the legal team to ensure contracts are aligned with company policies and adequately mitigate risks.     Relationship Management: Build and maintain relationships with existing and potential clients, industry partners, and government agencies involved in the tendering process. Attend pre-bid meetings, site visits, and industry events to foster business opportunities.           Requirements         Bachelor?? degree in business administration, Commerce, Engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience in tendering, bid management, or procurement.     Familiarity with tendering procedures, government regulations, and contract management.     Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with attention to detail.     Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.     Proficiency in using MS Office applications and tendering software/tools.     Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.     Knowledge of the industry or sector in which the company operates is a plus.     Effective time management and organizational skills to meet deadlines.     Experience in preparing tenders for government contracts is desirable.     This is a challenging role that requires strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work under pressure to meet strict deadlines.      The Tendering Executive will play a critical role in securing new business opportunities through successful tender submissions.      We offer a competitive salary and a supportive work environment that encourages professional growth and development.

column2: What is your mission statement         Build a client: You are required to make sales calls and build a portfolio of the clients. You will also be responsible for research and seeking our prospects.         Two-way link: You are to act as a link between clients, carriers, shippers, and receivers by relaying information.         Social customer service: You will also be responsible for establishing and developing relationships with clients, thus providing excellent customer service. You must also encourage customers to repeat business with us thus sustaining a solid relationship.         Crosscheck: You are also involved in overseeing the movement of clients goods. You must ensure that they are picked up, transported, and delivered on time. You must also keep records of customer satisfaction.         Barter queries: You are also assigned to manage rate negotiation with clients.         Talk your way: One of your major responsibilities would be to communicate with clients and prospects.         Plan meets: You are also expected to call clients and schedule visits whenever necessary to follow up on potential business.         Liaison with the operating team: You will also need to communicate with the operations team to track loads and clients or prospects to provide them with up-to-date information and process all customer purchases accordingly.         Generate leads: You must also generate promising leads for the outside sales team to pursue.         Happy customers: You should also manage the customer accounts by ensuring customer satisfaction with company products and services.         Take a no: You must also use sales scripts proffered by the company to drive sales and respond to customer rejections.         Know it all: You are also responsible for in-depth knowledge of customer products and services to make suitable recommendations based on customers needs and preferences. People skills: You must have excellent communication skills as you will be the face of the company with our clients.

column2: As a Technical Sales Executive, your role is to combine technical knowledge with sales skills to promote and sell technical products or services to customers      You will serve as a key link between the technical team and the customers, understanding their needs, and providing appropriate solutions      Your goal is to build strong relationships with customers, identify business opportunities, and achieve sales targets      Here are some key responsibilities and tasks associated with the role of a Technical Sales Executive:Product Knowledge: You will develop a deep understanding of the technical products or services offered by your company      This includes understanding their features, benefits, and how they address customer needs      You will stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies to effectively communicate the value proposition of the products to customers      Customer Engagement and Relationship Building: You will engage with prospective and existing customers to understand their requirements and demonstrate how your products or services can meet their needs      Building strong relationships with customers through effective communication and excellent customer service is crucial for success in this role      Solution Selling: You will work closely with customers to analyze their business problems and provide tailored solutions using your company's technical products or services      This involves conducting product demonstrations, preparing and presenting proposals, and addressing any technical queries or concerns raised by the customers      Sales Target Achievement: You will be responsible for meeting or exceeding sales targets set by the company      This requires effective sales planning, pipeline management, and proactive lead generation      You will work closely with the sales team, marketing team, and technical experts to drive sales opportunities and close deals      Market Research and Competitor Analysis: You will conduct market research to identify potential customers, market trends, and competitor activities      This information will help you position your products effectively and provide insights for sales strategies and pricing decisions      Technical Support and Training: You will provide technical support to customers throughout the sales process      This includes addressing technical questions, providing product training, and coordinating with the technical team to resolve any issues or concerns raised by customers      Sales Reporting and Forecasting: You will maintain accurate and up-to-date records of sales activities, customer interactions, and sales forecasts      This information will be used for reporting to management and for making informed business decisions      Collaboration with Internal Teams: You will collaborate with cross-functional teams within the organization, such as marketing, product development, and customer support, to ensure a seamless customer experience      You will provide feedback from customers to help improve products and services      As a Technical Sales Executive, your role requires a combination of technical knowledge, sales acumen, and strong interpersonal skills      By effectively communicating the value of technical products and services to customers and building trusted relationships, you contribute to the company's revenue growth and overall success
column11: Sales planning, Technical Sales Executive, Relationship building, Market research, Customer support, Customer service, Sales process, Customer engagement, Forecasting, Technical support

column2: Location: Hyderabad,Ernakulam,Kochi,Bengaluru,Chennai Salary + with additional benefits and incentives Educational Requirement: Completed 12th grade  Work Experience: At least 6 months in telesales or telemarketing Language Proficiency: English (Mandatory), Telugu, Malayalam, Tamil, - we can also consider Urdu candidates Job Overview- The Market Development team is our direct link to our customers and brings in the revenue. It includes sub teams like Renewals, HVM (High Value Memberships), Hubs, and Retail Centres. They might be spread across locations but they are united by one cause...Whats the sale for today? Role- As a Product Advisor, you will be responsible for making sales calls and closing sales pitches with our members. To be a successful Product Advisor, you should be persuasive and able to work in a high-pressure environment. Ultimately, a top-performing Product Advisor is the one who follows sales scripts and demonstrate exceptional communication, negotiation skills, and deliver a great customer experience. What you will do in this role:- Making outbound calls to our Members basis the leads provided offering the customers products which would help them in their life partner search. Following the defined sales process to convert free members into revenue paying customers. Ensuring Call Disposition Comments are updated once the call is completed with all relevant details. Making required number of calls for following up with Enquiries which are not converted. Updating the details of follow-up in the system. Meeting daily talktime Targets and Calls to be done. Meeting Revenue Targets and ensuring Lead to Conversion Ratios are met. Appearing for periodic evaluations. Interfacing with walk-in customers (if assigned the task), explaining to them features of company services/Centre and converting them to Premium Membership. Maintaining all documentation that pertains to the above responsibilities. What you should have:- 1 year of relevant experience Sales or Telesales. Strong negotiation and consultative selling skills.  Effective communication skills verbal and written. Clear diction and clarity in speech. Minimum Qualification HSC. Brownie Points:- Bachelors Degree. Fluency in Regional language.

column2: Job Description  Veranda HigherEd. Job. title:Admission Counsellor Location:Gurgaon, Haryana  Terms:Full time  Working Days:5.5 Requirements:Education Counselling and Educational Sales. About us: higher-ed is an e-learning platform for students who wish to continue and complete courses by attending live online courses, using a team of committed educators who will stop at nothing to impart education, helped by a 24*7 support system. By deploying our world-class team of industry experts, we aim to educate our learners with the skills they need to advance their professional life to the next level. HigherEd Partners with leading universities and educational institutes like IIT, IIM and MBA colleges such as LPU and Sastra to deliver the best online advanced executive certification programs and online MBA programs. Parent Company - https://www.verandalearning.com/ About the role:   Education counsellor is an individual contributor role for guiding and selling certifications as well as degree programmes to working professionals.   Responsibilities: Responsible for selling courses through outbound, inbound and Online Process. Converting leads into admissions for top IITs, IIMs and Degree colleges.  Generating referrals through the existing admissions.    Achieving weekly and monthly sales targets.  Responsible for converting any query into admissions. Attending 100-150 calls daily in order to achieve the allocated targets.  Counsel the working professionals related to the suitable courses as per there domain.   Candidate requirements: Excellent written and Verbal communication skills.   Creating urgency when required, Rebuttals and counselling skills Interpersonal Skills Active listening About our parent organization (Veranda) In ancient times, every house had a 'thinnai' or a veranda which was an outward extended platform in front of the house. It was here the children had their first lessons. That inspiration has carried us from strength to strength and today Veranda Learning has transformed into a digital learning company offering a multitude of career-defining courses. All these courses are offered through Veranda Race Learning Solutions Private Limited, Veranda CA Learning Solutions Private Limited, and Veranda HigherEd which are 100% subsidiary companies of Veranda Learning Solutions Private Limited. Core Values  Affordable to the Real India  High-quality Education  Outcome-oriented Approach About Veranda HigherEd We are committed to developing critical skills amongst new-age professionals. Veranda HigherEd offers cutting-edge digital learning experience through a range of advanced programs in Management, Technology, Leadership, and Marketing amongst others. These result-oriented live and interactive programs are offered in collaboration with some of the leading universities for you to upskill and fast-track your way up the career ladder. column2: Location: C-111, Kailash Vaibhav Industrial Complex, Near Hiranandani Powai, Off, Lalbahadur Shastri Rd, Vikhroli West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400079 Job Summary:  As a Tele Caller, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential customers with the aim of promoting and selling products or services. Your role will involve engaging customers, understanding their needs, and persuading them to purchase our offerings. You will also handle inbound calls, address customer inquiries, and provide information about our products or services. Key Responsibilities: Make outbound calls to potential customers based on provided leads or lists. Promote and sell products or services to achieve sales targets. Engage with customers in a friendly and professional manner. Understand customer needs and recommend suitable products or services. Explain product features, pricing, and benefits to customers. Answer incoming calls and respond to customer inquiries. Provide accurate information about products, services, and promotions. Resolve customer complaints or issues in a timely and effective manner. Maintain call logs, update customer records, and track sales activities. Follow up with customers to ensure satisfaction and encourage repeat business. Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to optimize strategies and improve customer experience. Adhere to company policies, procedures, and quality standards. Skills and Qualifications: High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or training in sales is a plus. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written. Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities. Customer-focused with a positive attitude. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Good organizational and time management skills. Willingness to learn about products or services and stay updated on industry trends. Resilience and ability to handle rejection or objections professionally.

column2: Role & responsibilities   The role (Purpose) of an Associate is multi-dimensional and covers academic, career, and personal aspects to support students in their overall well-being and success throughout their educational journey. An Associate would play a crucial role in helping students navigate the challenges and confusion associated in the search  for a suitable university.  1) Associate would counsel and advice students, individually, on issues related to planning an academic program, choosing an educational or career goal. 2) This includes initial inquiry and application, financial aid, scholarship opportunities, Deposit (Sale) and enrolment confirmation. 3) Associate would also support students in making career related decisions, assist students in the use of existing resources for learning about careers of interest to them and assist with programs and services related to placement activities. Assist prospective students in the application process, including providing guidance on how to complete the application, collecting required documents, and submitting the application. Review and evaluate applications for admission, making decisions on the eligibility of prospective students based on established criteria. Provide guidance and assistance to prospective students in securing financial aid and scholarships. Communicate with prospective students throughout the enrolment process, providing updates on their application status, answering questions, and addressing any concerns. Connecting with prospective students to provide information and answer questions about the program and convert as Sale. Collaborate with other departments to ensure a smooth and seamless enrolment process for prospective students. Maintain accurate and up-to-date records and files on prospective students. Stay current on industry developments and trends and provide insight and recommendations to improve the Sales/Admissions/Enrolment process.  Email Communication whenever required.  Sales Force Management - Managing Working/Nurturing/Opportunity pipeline.  Act as a liaison between internal teams and students.  Stay abreast of student recruitment trends and best practices. Preferred candidate profile     Graduate Degree.  Minimum 3 Years+ Experience. ESSENTIAL SKILLS  Fluency in English  Excellent organizational and consultative sales skills  Effective verbal/written communication skills  Exceptional customer service skills  Positive attitude and focused  Ability to creating urgency  Obtain end-to-end brand and product knowledge  Utilize consultative approach to close sales RELEVANT EXPERIENCE  Ability to research, assess, identify the candidate.  Ability work on databases (CRM-SF). PERSONAL CHARACTERISTICS & BEHAVIOURS  Lead by example,  Live the core values and drive company culture.  Self-Motivated  Adaptability Perks and benefits    Competitive market linked Compensation  Medical Insurance,  Transportation provided.  Day Shift

column2: As a Telecaller, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential customers or existing clients with the goal of generating leads, promoting products or services, and providing exceptional customer service. You will play a crucial role in building and maintaining positive relationships with customers through effective communication and persuasive skills.          Key Responsibilities:         Make outbound calls to prospective customers or existing clients as per assigned lists or databases.     Introduce products or services, explain their features, and highlight their benefits to potential customers.     Answer incoming calls from customers, address their inquiries, and provide accurate and timely information.     Follow scripts or call guidelines provided by the organization while making calls to ensure consistency and professionalism.     Maintain a customer database, update customer information, and record relevant details of each call for future reference.     Achieve daily, weekly, and monthly targets in terms of call volumes, leads generated, or sales closed.     Identify customer needs and preferences, offer appropriate solutions, and upsell or cross-sell products or services wherever applicable.     Follow up with customers via phone calls or emails to nurture leads, address concerns, and maintain customer satisfaction.     Collaborate with team members, sales representatives, or other departments to resolve customer issues or escalate complex queries.     Stay updated with product knowledge, industry trends, and competitive offerings to provide accurate and relevant information to customers.     Adhere to company policies, guidelines, and ethical standards while interacting with customers and handling sensitive information.     Provide regular feedback and reports on customer interactions, sales conversions, and market insights to the supervisor or team leader.         Qualifications and Skills:         High school diploma or equivalent qualification required. Additional certifications in customer service or sales will be an advantage.     Proven experience in telemarketing, customer service, or sales roles preferred.     Excellent verbal communication skills with a clear and pleasant phone manner.     Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities to convert leads into sales.     Active listening skills to understand customer needs and respond accordingly.     Basic computer knowledge and familiarity with CRM software or call center systems.     Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.     Strong organizational skills and attention to detail to maintain accurate customer records.     Positive and resilient attitude with the ability to handle rejection and objections professionally.     Proficiency in multiple languages may be advantageous depending on the target customer base

column2: As a Tele-caller, you will play a vital role in the organizations sales or customer support team by reaching out to potential customers or existing clients over the phone. Your primary objective will be to engage with prospects, introduce products or services, provide information, and persuade them to take the desired action, such as making a purchase, scheduling an appointment, or resolving their queries and concerns.   Responsibilities:      Outbound Calls: Initiate outbound calls to potential customers from provided lists, or follow up with existing clients to maintain relationships and provide support.         Sales or Support Pitch: Deliver product or service pitches, highlighting key features and benefits to potential customers. In case of support calls, listen attentively to customers issues and provide appropriate solutions or escalate to the relevant department.         Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential leads through effective questioning and data gathering during conversations.         Customer Engagement: Build rapport with prospects or customers, actively listen to their needs, and address their questions or concerns with professionalism and empathy.         Information Dissemination: Clearly communicate information regarding products, services, pricing, promotions, and any other relevant details to customers.         Record Keeping: Accurately document and maintain call records, including details of conversations, lead status, and follow-up actions, in the database or CRM system.         Sales Targets: Achieve weekly or monthly sales targets, where applicable, and contribute to the teams overall success.         Follow-Up Calls: Schedule and conduct follow-up calls to nurture leads and maintain relationships with existing customers.         Feedback and Reporting: Provide feedback on customer responses, product/service feedback, and areas for improvement to the supervisor or management.         Adherence to Scripts and Guidelines: Follow the provided call scripts, sales pitches, and call guidelines to maintain consistency in communication and ensure compliance with company policies.     Qualifications and Skills:      High school diploma or equivalent; some organizations may require a bachelors degree or relevant certifications.         Proven experience as a tele-caller or in a customer support or sales role is advantageous but not always mandatory.         Excellent verbal communication skills, including active listening and clear articulation.         Ability to engage customers and build rapport over the phone.         Persuasive skills to influence potential customers positively.         Familiarity with relevant computer software and CRM systems for call logging and management.         Ability to work in a target-driven environment and meet set goals.         Time management skills to prioritize and handle a high volume of calls effectively.         Patience, empathy, and problem-solving skills to address customer concerns.         Flexibility to adapt to changing scenarios and customer behaviors.         Being able to speak English, Hindi, Marathi, or Gujarati will be an added advantage.
column11: Outbound, Lead generation, Sales, Compliance, Product service, Time management, Customer support, Scheduling, Customer engagement, CRM

column2: ATFEM KHETIGAADI Pvt LTD is looking for Regional Tele Caller to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey. They may promote products, services, or special offers, and aim to generate interest or close sales.     Inbound Calls:Telecallers also handle inbound calls, addressing inquiries, providing information, and assisting customers with their needs.     Sales and Lead Generation:One of the primary functions of a Telecaller is to generate sales leads by identifying potential customers and gathering relevant information for follow-up by sales teams.     Customer Service:Telecallers provide customer support by addressing queries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to existing customers.     Surveys and Feedback:They conduct surveys to gather feedback from customers, which can be used to improve products, services, or customer experience.     Appointment Scheduling:Tele Callers may schedule appointments, meetings, or demos for sales representatives or other departments.     Script Adherence:They often follow prepared scripts to ensure consistent and accurate communication with customers.

Sales and Lead Generation:One of the primary functions of a Telecaller is to generate sales leads by identifying potential customers and gathering relevant information for follow-up by sales teams.     Customer Service:Telecallers provide customer support by addressing queries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to existing customers.     Surveys and Feedback:They conduct surveys to gather feedback from customers, which can be used to improve products, services, or customer experience.     Appointment Scheduling:Tele Callers may schedule appointments, meetings, or demos for sales representatives or other departments.     Script Adherence:They often follow prepared scripts to ensure consistent and accurate communication with customers.
column11: Outbound, Lead generation, Sales Representative, Customer support, Scheduling, Customer service, Customer experience

column2: ISBM was established in 1992 by a well-known NGO Aeron Foundation. It is also ranked among the top ten International B-Schools that provide management courses through correspondence. They provide daily objectives, develop reward systems for productivity that motivate new hires and seasoned workers alike, and communicate any issues with upper management to reach business goals effectively. He/she will be expected to devise sales plans, budgets & execution strategies; lead from the front in their execution, and achieve the sales targets. column2: Role & responsibilities    Conduct outbound calls to prospective customers with the goal of promoting and selling subscription-based services.  Develop a deep understanding of the features and benefits of subscription offerings in industries like BFSI, Ed-Tech, Consumer Goods, Auto, Real Estate, and Jobs.  Clearly articulate the value proposition of the subscriptions and address customer queries effectively.  Build and maintain positive customer relationships through regular follow-up calls.  Provide accurate information about products/services, pricing and promotions.  Facilitate the payment collection process through effective communication and relationship- building  Meet and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.  Continuously strive for improvement in key performance indicators related to sales and revenue. Preferred candidate profile    3-6 years of direct telesales experience, Strong understanding of industries such as BFSI, Ed- Tech, Consumer Goods, Auto, Real Estate, and Jobs.  Proven experience in telesales with a focus on subscription sales.  Excellent communication and negotiation skills.  Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team.  Familiarity with CRM software and sales tracking tools.  The ability to quickly grasp and effectively communicate product and service details to prospects, with proficiency in relevant languages (English & Hindi, Marathi, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali) based on regional requirements  Self-driven and highly motivated  Exceptional negotiation skills and the ability to handle and resolve issues and complaints effectively  Minimum qualification of 12th grade; candidates with any graduate or postgraduate degree are also encouraged to apply. Perks and benefits   If you're ready to take your telesales career to the next level and enjoy the flexibility of working from home, we invite you to share your updated resume with us at?careers@quikr.com. Join our dynamic remote team and help us achieve new sales milestones!

column2: Interested Candidates may connect with their Interest Level to Ms.Khushboo Gupta: -+91 89581-10044 About the Client: Research and Ranking (www.researchandranking.com) is among the fastest growing SEBI registered investment advisory firms which leverages technology to promote long-term investing in Indian equity markets. With technologically-enabled platforms, weve been able to deliver unparalleled investment advisory service and support to our 16000+ growing customers. With over 200+ employees and more than 11+ years in the business, R&R enjoys its presence in Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore and Chennai with an approach to continually scale up. ABOUT JOB OPPORTUNITY:  We are looking for a talented Sales Wealth Counselor who can counsel the prospective investors over calls and is capable of generating increasing sales for the organization by selling a variety of advisory services. We believe that an effective counselor is an excellent communicator with superior interpersonal skills and finds comfort in presenting services as well as dealing with employee grievances. As a counselor, we, thus, expect from you to be an outstanding communicator with a professional yet amicable approach who contributes in the company by bringing in and locking customers while developing business. JOB TITLE:  Sales Wealth Counselor  DEPARTMENT:  Sales/Marketing  LOCATION:  Sector-62, Noida  EXPERIENCE:  Freshers TOTAL CTC:  INR 2.00 LPA (In Hand) Plus VARIABLE  KEY ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  Prospect and qualify new sales leads  Sell the company's products by identifying and educating leads through calls with counseling with the right products and services.  Provide potential and existing customers with exceptional support  Track all sales activities in company CRM system and keep updating account information regularly  Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed  Achieve agreed upon individual and team sales targets and outcomes within schedule PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS  Excellent English-speaking skills  Comfortable in online sales  Creative thinking skills  Patience and ability to engage customers  Good persuasive ability  Ability to handle rejection and stress in soliciting customers  Working knowledge of relevant computer software  Excellent interpersonal and problem-solving skills Best of Luck!

column2: Job   Description:   Holiday   Cruise   Expert   (Sales   Development) Industry:  Hospitality/Travel Management Location:  Noida, Gurugram About   Company: Cordelia Cruises is India's only premium cruise line. We aspire to promote and drive the cruise culture in India through experiences that are stylish, luxurious, and, most importantly, inherently Indian. Empress boasts 796 cabins, 11 decks, multi- cuisine restaurants, bars & lounges, live entertainment, a rock climbing wall, casino, spa overlooking the ocean and so many activities to keep you entertained all day long. Its more than a destination. Its a literal city on the sea! Work   Responsibilities: ??Conduct outbound calls to potential customers to introduce Cordelia Cruises and generate   interest and close the sales on call. ??Effectively communicate product features, benefits, and pricing to prospects. ??Identify and understand customer needs, and tailor solutions to match their requirements. ??Provide accurate and up-to-date information about products and services to address customer   inquiries. ??Utilize strong persuasion and negotiation skills to close sales and meet or exceed sales. ??Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities in the CRM   system. ??Collaborate with team members to share insights, strategies, and best practices for achieving   sales goals. ??Keep abreast of industry trends and competitor offerings to better position our   products/services. ??Follow up with potential customers who have shown interest but have not yet made a purchase. ??Continuously improve sales techniques through ongoing training and self-development. ??Provide regular reports on call outcomes, sales conversions, and key performance indicators. ??Maintain professionalism, positivity, and a customer-centric approach in all interactions. ??Maintain a strong understanding of our products, services, and industry trends to position them   effectively. Key   Skills: ??Proven experience in Tele-sales, tele marketing or similar role with successful track record of   meeting or exceeding sales. ??Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with ability to build rapport and establish   positive relationship over the phone. ??Strong persuasion skills to close deals and handle objections effectively. ??Excellent time management and organizational skills to prioritize tasks and manage a high   volume of calls. Additional   Information: ??This is a full time position, requiring your dedicated commitment to our sales initiatives and   customer engagement. ?? Six   Days   Working:  The Holiday Cruise Expert position involves a six-day workweek, enabling you to maximize your efforts in reaching out to potential customers and achieving sales goals. ?? Rotational   Week   Off:  We offer one-day rotational week off schedule. ?? Reporting   to   Team   Leader:  The Holiday Cruise Expert will report directly to the respective Team   manager. What   We   Offer: ??Competitive salary. ??Professional development opportunities and continuous learning initiatives. ??A collaborative and innovative work environment that values diversity and inclusion. ??The chance to shape and work on the sales strategy for a rapidly growing organization.   Full-time   Employee   Benefits: ??Paid leaves: 26 days of annual paid leave for employees. ??Paid Mediclaim: Comprehensive medical coverage of yearly Rs. 7 lakhs with premium of   Rs.850 per month for maximum 6 immediate family members. ??Insurance coverage: Insurance package provided to all employees. ??Orientation tour on the cruise for one day. ??One complimentary sailing trip offered to employees and their families. ??Well-equipped cafeteria providing variety of delicious food options. ??Employee discounts on cruise booking for friends and family. ??Yearly employee recognition and award programs for outstanding performance. How   to   Apply: If you are a strategic and results-driven sales individual with a passion for driving growth in the sales sector, we invite you to submit your resume and a detailed cover letter outlining your relevant experience or why you are the ideal candidate for this position. Please send your application to  priyanka.d@waterways-leisure.com Please find company website and links below: https://www.cordeliacruises.com/ Cordelia Cruises ( @cordeliacruises ) - Instagram

column2: You dont sell here, you only make peoples memories come true. You will be someone who's completely come in terms with your phone constantly buzzing with calls. You are too good at finalizing deals and converting leads into customers comes naturally to you. Numbers excite you and you don't think twice to recollect the percentage functions you learnt in your second grade. You are an inter*seller* and you never settle for low targets.You get to talk to people who want to travel and love travelling and get to make their vacations comes true, Thats all you do at Pickyourtrail. And you will be enabled by the best training of different destinations and a product that will help you send million and millions of itineraries at any point of time Roles and Responsibilities Should be able to understand and appreciate how sales works Should meet the monthly sales goals  Should be a passionate self-starter whos ready to get their hands dirty Should envision and manage the growth of vertical to complement business growth Should have clarity in thought and articulation. Prior experience in a high-energy and intense environment Requirements Strong verbal and written communication skills Should have clarity in thought and articulation Should be able to understand and appreciate that chaos/randomization is the only constant at a startup Should be a passionate self-starter Ready to get their hands dirty If you are coming in with meaningful work experience, Pickyourtrail offers you 3 key benefits: Clear strategy and Roadmap -  Even the pandemic didnt get us to pivot :) At Pickyourtrail, you are assured of an environment which is stable with respect to overarching goals. This gives you a stable base to experiment and drive towards the desired end state. We shy away from randomisations and strive towards a well drawn down quarter operating plan to ensure that all teams across Revenue - Design - Marketing - Engg - Operations  - Product are aligned. High Impact Opportunity -  We believe that leisure travel is where online meetings were in feb 2020 - waiting to explode. There could be no better time to leverage your past experience to help the organization grow faster towards the desired outcomes.   No Cap to Earning Potential  - As the saying goes, more the merrier. At Pickyourtrail, rewards are unlimited. Higher the happiness you bring on to our customers by planning a meaningful vacation, higher the rewards the company would extend.

column2: Telle   Caller   &   Jr.   Sales   Executive   - Job   Title:  Telecaller & Junior Sales Executive Location:  Dadar West Company   Overview: Linus Furniture is a leading Bespoke Furniture & Turnkey Interiors brand, dedicated to providing exceptional design solutions and customer service. As we expand our team, we are seeking enthusiastic individuals to join us in the roles of Tele Caller & Jr. Sales Executive. Job   Description: We are looking for proactive and dynamic individuals to join our team. As a Telecaller & Junior Sales Executive, you will be responsible for engaging with customers over the phone, promoting our products and services, and assisting in sales activities. This role offers an excellent opportunity for freshers to kickstart their careers in sales within the furniture and interior industry. Responsibilities:  Make outbound calls to prospective customers to introduce our products and services.  Handle inbound calls and inquiries from customers, providing information and assistance as needed.  Maintain a high level of customer service in all interactions.  Utilize effective communication, persuasion, and negotiation skills to convert leads into sales.  Assist in maintaining customer databases and sales records.  Learn and apply sales techniques to effectively promote products and close deals.  Demonstrate proficiency in using MS Office Suite & Google Suite for sales-related tasks.  Provide feedback and insights to improve sales strategies and processes.  Adhere to company policies and procedures in all sales activities. Skills   Required:  Proficiency in English, Hindi, and Marathi is essential.  Strong customer service orientation with excellent communication skills.  Knowledge of MS Office Suite & Google.    Ability to effectively communicate, persuade, and negotiate with customers.  Eagerness to learn and develop sales techniques and strategies.  Positive attitude with a willingness to work in a fast-paced environment.  Team player with excellent interpersonal skills. Application   Instructions: If you possess the requisite skills and are enthusiastic about contributing to our dynamic team, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Please submit your resume highlighting your relevant experience and suitability for the role. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

column2: Prospecting with suspect leads. A suspect is a person who has still not decided on taking a loan.      Converting a suspect to a prospect. This involves the following:      Establishing contact with the prospect, this could involve several calls and may need a call at a time beyond office hours.      This will also involve making calls at different times in order to achieve success.      Need Analysis      Eligibility Profiling      Setting up an appointment      Follow up with the prospect post every meeting with the sales officer until conclusion          Basis feedback from the prospect, seek interventions from the senior sales resource or by your own-self in satisfying customer needs with the objective of converting the prospect to a customer      Responsible for conversion of suspects to prospects to customers      Provide support to the sales team in increasing conversions by:      Prompt calling to all suspects / prospects      Timely follow up with all prospects      Cordial relationships with the sales officer mapped, collaborating with the sales officer in providing feedback, seeking feedback from him on your performance          Responsible for complete knowledge of company products and policies as well as those of competition      Responsible for quality of the conversation, which entails the following:      Accuracy      Product Knowledge      Appraisal Skills      Punctuality TOS      TAT commitments          Ability to handle objections      Updating the software. You must capture your conversation with the customer effectively such that a third person is able to carry on the conversation with the customer where you left off.      Generating References: The quality of your conversation and your ability to connect with the customer is also reflected in the number of references that you generate.      Providing market feedback to the supervisor:        It is important to share with your supervisor any trends that you come across whilst speaking to a prospect. column2: About LenDenClub LenDenClub is a leading peer-to-peer lending platform that provides an alternate investment opportunity to investors or lenders looking for high returns with creditworthy borrowers looking for short-term personal loans. With a total of 8 million users and 2 million+ investors on board, LenDenClub has become a go-to platform to earn returns in the range of 10%-12%. LenDenClub offers investors a convenient medium to browse thousands of borrower profiles to achieve better returns than traditional asset classes. Moreover, LenDenClub is safeguarded by market volatility and inflation. LenDenClub provides a great way to diversify ones investment portfolio. LenDenClub has raised US $10 million in a Series A round from an association of investors. With the new round of funding, LenDenClub was valued at more than US $51 million in the last round and has grown multifold since then. With ace cricketer Hardik Pandya as the brand ambassador, the platform is raising awareness about P2P lending amongst the larger population of the country. Why work at LenDenClub LenDenClub is a certified great place to work. The certification comes from the Great Place to Work Institute, Inc, a globally renowned firm dedicated to evaluating companies for their employee satisfaction on the grounds of high trust and high-performance culture at workplaces. As a LenDenite, you will be a part of an enthusiastic and passionate group of individuals who own and love what they do. At LenDenClub we believe in creating leaders and with you coming on board you get to work with complete freedom to chase your ultimate career goal without any inhibitions. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients through effective communication and follow-up. Identify and qualify leads, understanding clients' trading needs and objectives.
