column2: Vidya Prakashan Mandir Ltd. is looking for Telesales Representative to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      A tele sales executive, also known as a telemarketer or inside sales representative, is a professional who sells products or services over the phone      They work in call centers or contact centers and engage in outbound calls to reach potential customers, build relationships, and generate sales      The responsibilities of a telesales executive typically include:Making Outbound Calls: Initiating outbound calls to prospective customers using a pre-defined list or database      These calls may be cold calls (contacting leads who have no prior interaction with the company) or warm calls (following up with interested leads or existing customers)      Product or Service Presentation: Presenting and explaining the features, benefits, and value proposition of the products or services being offered      This involves effective communication skills to engage the customer, address their needs, and highlight the unique selling points of the offerings      Handling Customer Inquiries: Responding to customer inquiries and providing information about the products or services      This may involve addressing questions, clarifying doubts, and overcoming objections to persuade the customer to make a purchase      Lead Qualification and Follow-Up: Assessing the potential of leads based on specific criteria or qualifications      Telesales executives determine whether a lead is likely to convert into a sale and prioritize follow-up activities accordingly      Sales Conversion and Closing Deals: Using persuasive selling techniques to convince potential customers to make a purchase      Telesales executives negotiate prices, offer discounts or promotions, and guide customers through the purchasing process to close the sale      Relationship Building: Building rapport and developing relationships with customers to enhance customer loyalty and encourage repeat business      Telesales executives may maintain regular contact with customers, provide after-sales support, and explore opportunities for upselling or cross-selling      Sales Reporting and Documentation: Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and outcomes      This includes updating customer details, recording sales transactions, and generating reports on sales performance and targets      Product Knowledge and Training: Acquiring and maintaining a deep understanding of the products or services being sold      Telesales executives need to be well-versed in product features, specifications, pricing, and frequently asked questions to effectively address customer inquiries      Meeting Sales Targets: Working towards achieving individual and team sales targets set by the organization      Telesales executives are often expected to meet specific sales quotas and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to sales conversion, call volume, and revenue generation      Effective communication skills, persuasive abilities, resilience, and persistence are crucial for success in a tele sales executive role      Active listening, empathy, and adaptability to different customer personalities and situations are also important for building rapport and satisfying customer needs
column11: Telesales, Representative

column2: Role: Sales Consultant  Lead Closure(Tamil Language only) Location: Gurugram About Spinny : Founded in 2015, Spinny is a used car retailing platform that aims to bring about transparency and convenience in the car buying  and selling process in India. Spinny operates across the entire value chain of pre-owned cars, embedding superior technology and  processes to deliver a premium experience to customers. As a testimony of Spinny's commitment to transparency and quality, every  car on the Spinny platform comes with a 200-point inspection checklist, 5-day no questions asked money-back guarantee, and 1- year after-sales warranty. Spinny is backed by leading global venture firms - Tiger Global, ADQ, Avenir Growth, Accel Partners,  and Elevation Capital, and is currently valued at ~ USD 1.8 Bn. Currently, Spinny has 35 car hubs that operate across 15 cities - Delhi, Gurugram, Noida, Bangalore, Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kolkata, Ahmedabad, Lucknow, Jaipur, Chandigarh,  Indore and Coimbatore.  About the Role: You will be responsible for closing deals with customers after they visit the retail hub, dealing with negotiations and payment  managements as required. Interested candidates must have an ingenious, scientific approach to problems, backed by a strong  outcome-oriented point of view. Interested candidates must have demonstrated experience in customer service. column2: Vimerse Infotech  is looking for Tele Caller (B2C)  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    Outbound Calls:Telecallers make outbound calls to reach out to potential clients, customers, or leads. They may promote products, services, or special offers, and aim to generate interest or close sales.     Inbound Calls:Telecallers also handle inbound calls, addressing inquiries, providing information, and assisting customers with their needs.     Sales and Lead Generation:One of the primary functions of a Telecaller is to generate sales leads by identifying potential customers and gathering relevant information for follow-up by sales teams.     Customer Service:Telecallers provide customer support by addressing queries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to existing customers.     Surveys and Feedback:They conduct surveys to gather feedback from customers, which can be used to improve products, services, or customer experience.     Appointment Scheduling:Tele Callers may schedule appointments, meetings, or demos for sales representatives or other departments.     Script Adherence:They often follow prepared scripts to ensure consistent and accurate communication with customers.

column2: A tele sales executive, also known as a telemarketer or inside sales representative, is a professional who sells products or services over the phone      They work in call centers or contact centers and engage in outbound calls to reach potential customers, build relationships, and generate sales      The responsibilities of a telesales executive typically include:Making Outbound Calls: Initiating outbound calls to prospective customers using a pre-defined list or database      These calls may be cold calls (contacting leads who have no prior interaction with the company) or warm calls (following up with interested leads or existing customers)      Product or Service Presentation: Presenting and explaining the features, benefits, and value proposition of the products or services being offered      This involves effective communication skills to engage the customer, address their needs, and highlight the unique selling points of the offerings      Handling Customer Inquiries: Responding to customer inquiries and providing information about the products or services      This may involve addressing questions, clarifying doubts, and overcoming objections to persuade the customer to make a purchase      Lead Qualification and Follow-Up: Assessing the potential of leads based on specific criteria or qualifications      Telesales executives determine whether a lead is likely to convert into a sale and prioritize follow-up activities accordingly      Sales Conversion and Closing Deals: Using persuasive selling techniques to convince potential customers to make a purchase      Telesales executives negotiate prices, offer discounts or promotions, and guide customers through the purchasing process to close the sale      Relationship Building: Building rapport and developing relationships with customers to enhance customer loyalty and encourage repeat business      Telesales executives may maintain regular contact with customers, provide after-sales support, and explore opportunities for upselling or cross-selling      Sales Reporting and Documentation: Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and outcomes      This includes updating customer details, recording sales transactions, and generating reports on sales performance and targets      Product Knowledge and Training: Acquiring and maintaining a deep understanding of the products or services being sold      Telesales executives need to be well-versed in product features, specifications, pricing, and frequently asked questions to effectively address customer inquiries      Meeting Sales Targets: Working towards achieving individual and team sales targets set by the organization      Telesales executives are often expected to meet specific sales quotas and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to sales conversion, call volume, and revenue generation      Effective communication skills, persuasive abilities, resilience, and persistence are crucial for success in a tele sales executive role      Active listening, empathy, and adaptability to different customer personalities and situations are also important for building rapport and satisfying customer needs
column11: upselling, revenue generation, relationship building, presentation skills, lead qualification, customer interaction, sales activities, sales, inside sales, promotions, outbound, telesales, ups, product knowledge, reporting, communication skills, follow ups

column2: Job description Veranda Phire is seeking a motivated and dynamic individual to join our team as a Career Counselor / Tele caller in Chennai. In this role, you will be responsible for providing comprehensive career guidance and counseling services to prospective students interested in pursuing banking-related training programs offered by Veranda Phire. Key Responsibilities : 1. Career Counseling: Provide personalized career guidance and counseling to individuals interested in pursuing banking training programs. Assess their educational background, career goals, and interests to recommend suitable courses offered by Veranda Phire. 2. Telecalling: Initiate outbound calls to prospective students who have shown interest in Veranda Phire's programs. Engage in informative conversations to address their queries, promote our courses, and encourage enrollment. 3. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with prospective students. Address their concerns and provide accurate information about Veranda Phire's programs, admission process, fees, and other relevant details. 4. Follow-up: Follow up with leads through calls, emails, and other communication channels to nurture relationships and facilitate enrollment. Provide ongoing support and assistance to students throughout the admission process. 5. Collaboration: Coordinate with the admissions team and other departments to streamline the enrollment process and ensure a seamless experience for students. Qualifications and Skills: - Bachelor's degree in any discipline. A background in counseling, psychology, education, or related fields is preferred. - Proven experience in telecalling, sales, customer service, or a similar role. Experience in educational counseling or student recruitment is a plus. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to engage with people from diverse backgrounds and build rapport effectively. - Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize responsibilities efficiently. - Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications and CRM software. - Enthusiasm for the education sector and a genuine interest in helping individuals achieve their career goals.

At Niva Bupa, our mission is to help our customers live healthier and more successful lives by providing expertise as healthcare partners. And this, we realize is only possible by constantly raising the bar in the standard of health insurances and by keeping our promises to you, our customer and caring for you, for life. About policy Bazaar.com   Policy Bazaar was founded in 2008 with one objective: bringing transparency in insurance. The founders wanted to reimaging insurance, so they started by simplifying all the information around plans, ending the rampant mis-selling, and preventing policy lapses. Today, we are India's best & largest online insurance marketplace. Over  9+ million (90 lakh+)  individuals have come to us & bought the best insurance plans from the top insurers in the country. We have sold over  19 million policies  since inception, and this number is only growing. While we are happy with how we are changing insurance for the country, we know there is still a lot of work to be done. Our vision to bring pioneering technologies & innovations to the field continues to grow. We aspire to build a health & financial safety net for more households in India in the coming years. Globiva Services Private Limited is a dynamic and fast-growing organization in the insurance sector, committed to providing comprehensive solutions to our clients. column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associates For Motor Insurance ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Mr.Shalini Chauhan +91-80776-90003 About PolicyBazaar: PolicyBazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace providing a platform to compare and purchase various insurance products.   About the Profile: As an Associate Sales Consultant, you will interact with customers, understand their motor insurance needs, and guide them in selecting suitable plans.   About Motor Insurance Scheme: Motor insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection against damages or losses incurred due to accidents, theft, or natural calamities involving vehicles. These schemes offer coverage for various risks, including third-party liabilities, own damage, and personal accident cover. Motor insurance plans can be tailored to fit individual or commercial requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive motor insurance plan can safeguard vehicle owners from financial burdens arising from unforeseen circumstances.   Key Responsibilities: - Respond to inbound inquiries from customers regarding motor insurance products. - Assess customer requirements and recommend suitable motor insurance plans. - Explain policy features, coverage, exclusions, and additional riders to customers. - Guide customers through the online platform for comparing and selecting plans. - Provide exceptional customer service and address concerns related to motor insurance. - Cross-sell and upsell related insurance products as per customer requirements. - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities. - Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and goals.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the motor insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of motor insurance products, terminologies, and related regulations. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Benefits: - CTC from 3.0 LPA to 4.5 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package - Day shift only - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associate For Investment Process ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Deepti Sharma- +91-78170-00494 Job Summary: We are seeking motivated and driven individuals to join our team as Associate Sales Consultants for Investment Plans. In this role, you will be responsible for promoting and selling Policy Bazaar's investment products and services, primarily focusing on mutual funds, equity-linked saving schemes (ELSS), and other investment plans. Your goal will be to help customers achieve their financial objectives by recommending suitable investment solutions tailored to their needs and risk profile.   About Investment Plans: At Policy Bazaar, we offer a comprehensive range of investment plans designed to meet the diverse financial goals of our customers. Our investment products include mutual funds (equity, debt, and hybrid funds), equity-linked saving schemes (ELSS), retirement plans, and other investment solutions. These plans are carefully curated from reputable asset management companies and financial institutions, ensuring our customers have access to high-quality investment options.   Key Responsibilities: 1. Conduct outbound calls and follow-up with potential customers to present Policy Bazaar's investment plans and products. 2. Handle inbound inquiries from customers interested in investment products and provide comprehensive information. 3. Identify customer investment objectives, risk tolerance, and financial circumstances to recommend suitable investment solutions. 4. Explain the features, benefits, and risks associated with different investment plans to customers in a clear and understandable manner. 5. Address customer queries, concerns, and objections effectively, and provide exemplary customer service. 6. Achieve and exceed sales targets by converting leads into successful sales. 7. Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and lead management in the CRM system. 8. Stay up-to-date with the latest investment products, market trends, and industry regulations. 9. Collaborate with team members, share best practices, and contribute to the overall success of the sales team. 10. Adhere to company policies, procedures, and ethical standards while conducting sales activities.   Qualifications and Requirements: 1. Bachelor's degree or equivalent in any discipline. 2. Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and regional languages (if applicable). 3. Strong persuasion, negotiation, and customer service skills. 4. Basic understanding of financial products, particularly investment plans and mutual funds. 5. Proficiency in using computer systems and CRM software. 6. Self-motivated and target-driven with a strong sales mindset. 7. Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. 8. Prior experience in sales, particularly in the financial or investment domain, is preferred but not mandatory.   Shift Type:  Day shifts (specific timings may vary) Experience:  Fresh graduates or candidates with up to 2 years of relevant experience are welcome to apply. Compensation:  Competitive salary 2.52LPA to 4.00LPA (based on experience and Interview performance). Policy Bazaar is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment. We encourage qualified individuals from all backgrounds to apply.

column1: Policy Bazaar is hiring Sales Associates For Team Insurance Process ||
column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Afreen Manzoor- +91-93206-13279   About PolicyBazaar: PolicyBazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace providing a platform to compare and purchase various insurance products.   About the Profile: As an Associate Sales Consultant, you will interact with customers, understand their term insurance needs, and guide them in selecting suitable plans.   About Term Insurance Scheme: Term insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection to the policyholder's family in case of their unfortunate demise during the policy term. These schemes offer a lump sum death benefit to the nominees, helping them manage financial obligations and secure their future. Term insurance plans can be customized based on individual or family requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive term insurance plan can provide peace of mind and financial security for loved ones.   Key Responsibilities: - Respond to inbound inquiries from customers regarding term insurance products. - Evaluate customer needs and recommend suitable term insurance plans. - Clearly explain policy features, coverage, and exclusions to customers. - Guide customers through the online platform for comparing and selecting plans. - Provide exceptional customer service and address concerns promptly. - Cross-sell and upsell related insurance products as per customer requirements. - Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and sales activities. - Collaborate with team members to achieve sales targets and goals.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the term insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of term insurance products and terminology is preferred. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Benefits: - CTC upto 4.0 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package - Day shift only - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column2: Great Opportunity for Fresher & Experienced to make their career with Policy Bazaar   To schedule the Face 2 Face interview, Pl connect   Ms.Shikha Sharma- +91-87000-43971   About PolicyBazaar: PolicyBazaar is a leading online insurance marketplace that provides a transparent and convenient platform for customers to compare and purchase various insurance products, including health insurance. The company is dedicated to simplifying the insurance buying process and empowering customers with the knowledge and tools to make informed decisions.   About the Profile: As an Associate Sales Consultant, you will be a part of the dynamic and customer-centric team at PolicyBazaar. Your role will involve interacting with domestic/international customers, understanding their health insurance needs, and guiding them through the process of selecting and purchasing suitable health insurance plans. You will be the face of PolicyBazaar, ensuring exceptional customer service and building long-lasting relationships.   About Health Insurance Scheme: Health insurance schemes are designed to provide financial protection against medical expenses incurred due to illnesses, injuries, or hospitalization. These schemes offer coverage for various medical treatments, including hospitalization costs, surgical expenses, diagnostic tests, and more. Health insurance plans can be customized based on individual or family requirements, offering varying levels of coverage and premium amounts. Having a comprehensive health insurance plan can help mitigate the financial burden of medical emergencies and ensure access to quality healthcare services.   Key Responsibilities: - Handle inbound calls from domestic/international customers with professionalism and courtesy. - Understand customers' inquiries, concerns, and requirements related to health insurance products. - Provide accurate and relevant information about health insurance products, policies, and services offered by Policybazaar.com. - Assist customers in navigating the Policybazaar.com platform to compare and select suitable health insurance options. - Address customer queries and concerns effectively, ensuring a satisfactory resolution to their issues. - Educate customers about various health insurance plans and help them make informed decisions. - Maintain a high level of customer service by adhering to established processes and quality standards. - Document customer interactions and feedback for continuous improvement of services. - Collaborate with team members and contribute to a positive and supportive work environment.   Qualifications and Experience: - Minimum qualification: High school diploma or equivalent. - Freshers and candidates with prior experience in a similar inbound voice process are encouraged to apply. - Experience in the health insurance industry or customer service domain will be an added advantage.   Skills and Competencies: - Excellent communication skills in English, both verbal and written. - Strong customer service orientation with a pleasant and patient manner. - Ability to handle challenging and varied customer situations with empathy and professionalism. - Basic knowledge of health insurance products and terminology is preferred. - Computer proficiency and familiarity with CRM software or similar applications. - Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.   Compensation and Benefits: - CTC from 3.0 LPA to 4.5 LPA (based on experience and qualifications) - Competitive benefits package   Working Hours: - Day shift only   Selection Process: - Candidates will go through a face-to-face interview as part of the selection process.

column1: Hiring Sales Wealth Counselor For Leading Investment Advisory
column2: Interested Candidates may connect with their Interest Level to Ms.Komal Saxena- +91 97580-00279   About the Client: Research and Ranking (www.researchandranking.com) is among the fastest growing SEBI registered investment advisory firms which leverages technology to promote long-term investing in Indian equity markets. With technologically-enabled platforms, weve been able to deliver unparalleled investment advisory service and support to our 16000+ growing customers. With over 200+ employees and more than 11+ years in the business, R&R enjoys its presence in Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore and Chennai with an approach to continually scale up. ABOUT JOB OPPORTUNITY:  We are looking for a talented Sales Wealth Counselor who can counsel the prospective investors over calls and is capable of generating increasing sales for the organization by selling a variety of advisory services. We believe that an effective counselor is an excellent communicator with superior interpersonal skills and finds comfort in presenting services as well as dealing with employee grievances. As a counselor, we, thus, expect from you to be an outstanding communicator with a professional yet amicable approach who contributes in the company by bringing in and locking customers while developing business. JOB TITLE:  Sales Wealth Counselor  DEPARTMENT:  Sales/Marketing  LOCATION:  Sector-62, Noida  EXPERIENCE:  Freshers TOTAL CTC:  INR 3.50 LPA (In Hand) Plus VARIABLE  KEY ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  Prospect and qualify new sales leads  Sell the company's products by identifying and educating leads through calls with counseling with the right products and services.  Provide potential and existing customers with exceptional support  Track all sales activities in company CRM system and keep updating account information regularly  Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed  Achieve agreed upon individual and team sales targets and outcomes within schedule PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & SKILLS  Excellent English-speaking skills  Comfortable in online sales  Creative thinking skills  Patience and ability to engage customers  Good persuasive ability  Ability to handle rejection and stress in soliciting customers  Working knowledge of relevant computer software  Excellent interpersonal and problem-solving skills Best of Luck!

column2: About LenDenClub LenDenClub is a leading peer-to-peer lending platform that provides an alternate investment opportunity to investors or lenders looking for high returns with creditworthy borrowers looking for short-term personal loans. With a total of 8 million users and 2 million+ investors on board, LenDenClub has become a go-to platform to earn returns in the range of 10%-12%. LenDenClub offers investors a convenient medium to browse thousands of borrower profiles to achieve better returns than traditional asset classes. Moreover, LenDenClub is safeguarded by market volatility and inflation. LenDenClub provides a great way to diversify ones investment portfolio. LenDenClub has raised US $10 million in a Series A round from an association of investors. With the new round of funding, LenDenClub was valued at more than US $51 million in the last round and has grown multifold since then. With ace cricketer Hardik Pandya as the brand ambassador, the platform is raising awareness about P2P lending amongst the larger population of the country. Why work at LenDenClub LenDenClub is a certified great place to work. The certification comes from the Great Place to Work Institute, Inc, a globally renowned firm dedicated to evaluating companies for their employee satisfaction on the grounds of high trust and high-performance culture at workplaces. As a LenDenite, you will be a part of an enthusiastic and passionate group of individuals who own and love what they do. At LenDenClub we believe in creating leaders and with you coming on board you get to work with complete freedom to chase your ultimate career goal without any inhibitions. Roles and Responsibilities: Guide investors through the registration process, ensuring smooth and efficient onboarding. Communicate with investors via phone calls, emails, and other channels to understand their needs and preferences. Present and pitch our products and services to potential investors, highlighting their benefits and value proposition. Achieve sales targets and quotas within specified timelines, consistently striving to exceed expectations.  Develop and nurture relationships with investors, providing ongoing support and assistance to meet their financial objectives.  Proactively identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling additional products or services.  Stay updated on industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to enhance sales strategies.  Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing and product development, to optimize sales processes and offerings.  Maintain accurate records of interactions and transactions using CRM software.  Provide regular reports and updates on sales performance, market insights, and customer feedback to management.

column1: Virtual Relationship Manager - Work From Home
column2: Role & responsibilities     To provide his portfolio customers with personalized service so as to develop close relationships, achieve maximum profitable contribution for the bank and retain their loyalty. Nurture the clients and enable them to Mashreq Plus eligibility for upgrading them to Certified F-F RMs. Minimize customer attrition & maintain customer contact. Enhance Mashreq Plus Balance sheet sales and promote the cross selling of bank product to existing potential customers. Safeguard the bank from potential loss To continue to maintain and improve the quality of service offered to Priority customers. Acquire new to bank affluent customers. Reach financial goals set for the role by the business as per annual and monthly financial targets, including x-sell and up-sell of products to customers, to existing and new to bank customers.   Optimize the potential value of the client base through the delivery of MG Products and Services Communicate with HNW client and identify their financial needs Achieve Revenue Goals, sales and portfolio growth targets across a range of products and services Maximize profitability from the Mashreq Plus base whilst countering competition from other providers offering alternative investments / WM opportunities Acquire New to Bank HNW clients. Maintain a superior customer service experience for clients including preempting issues and proactive servicing. Safeguard the bank from potential loss / AML fraud / and ensure ethical behavior at all times during and after sales. Enhance market profile and awareness Minimize customer attrition Maintain proactive client contact.   Operates in Mashreq Plus environment where the job holder interacts with customers through telephone, emails and face to face (when necessary). Operates within standard rules and guidelines set by bank and additional ones set by Mashreq Plus Product & Proposition and Governance & Controls. Frequently interacts with CCU, CPC, GSU, CAM and Governance to ensure smooth running of business. Interact with product managers / line managers to constantly provide feedback on competition and client response to product / services Ensure client expectations are constantly met Preferred candidate profile   Ability to understand customers financial needs on a one on one basis Intricate understanding of products pertaining to HNW customers  both internal and external (competitors) Advanced Market knowledge of various investment vehicles / markets / economics Accurate projection of sales numbers Proactive action on customer feedback and needs Timely escalation of service issues   University Graduate. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Fluency in English and Arabic language is an added advantage. At least, 2 years??experience in a similar job with another bank / financial services. Strong sales knowledge & insurance/investments/ Financial Market Knowledge. Strong Interpersonal skills and cultural sensitivity Relationship Management & Networking skills. Extrovert & amiable personality Strong analytical and numerical skills. Ability to work under pressure and think on his / her feet. Dynamic, results-oriented approach to work.

column1: Inside Sales Executive / Sr. Inside Sales Executive
column2: We are looking for a talented and competitive Inside Sales Representative that thrives in a quick sales cycle environment. An inside sales executive will play a fundamental role in achieving our ambitious customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You must be comfortable making cold calls ,  working closely with Sales Account Manager and BDM ,  generating interest ,  qualifying prospects ,  follow ups and closing sales.   Responsibilities :    Cold call prospects that are generated by external sources of lead. Identify decision makers within targeted leads to begin sales process. Penetrate all targeted accounts and radiate sales from within client base. Collaborate with Sales Supervisor and Account Managers to determine necessary strategic sales approaches. Create and deliver qualified opportunities to Account Managers where appropriate. Maintain and expand the company s database of prospects. Ensure follow - up by passing leads to Account Managers with calls - to - action ,  dates ,  complete profile information ,  sources ,  and so on. Set up and deliver sales presentations ,  product / service demonstrations. No Monetary Targets. Fix up Appointments with IT Managers ,  Head and CXO s. Good Carrier oriented growth in Marketing and Sales. Marketing Fresher Students are welcomed. Eligibility Criteria :    1 4 years of experience as inside sales executive. Qualification: Graduate / MBA. Effective convincing skills with good command on Hindi and English.

column2: ?       Description   :     We are searching for an engaged Telecaller to boost sales by reaching out to current and possible clients. Telecaller should be able to generate leads for field sales team. Sujata sells IT products so selling to IT managers, CIOs and purchase managers will be a part of this role. To this end, the Telecaller will be required to obtain lists of company s/individuals information, and to source data for additional members of the target audience. You should also jot down important notes during conversations to facilitate follow-ups by our sales staff. To be successful as a Telecaller, you should be able to convince even the toughest of individuals to purchase our offerings. A remarkable Telecaller will suggest ways in which clients feedback can be utilized to improve our services.       Responsibilites   :     Studying the details of each offering and remaining abreast of updates to these offerings. Obtaining and updating lists of individuals contact details. Calling active and budding clients to encourage the purchase of items. Addressing clients uncertainties, grievances, and suggestions on time. Noting important details of each conversation. Communicating verbal acceptances of offers to our Sales team for closing. Recording all successful and unsuccessful attempts to close sales. Attending regular team meetings to clarify progress and performance-related expectations. Conducting each of your functions with the utmost respect, regardless of others dispositions.       Requirements:         High school / diploma or equivalent.       Prior experience as a Telecaller or similar will be an advantage.       Freshers too can apply Completion of a sales-related training program is preferred.       Computer literate.       Exposure to diverse viewpoints, cultural norms, and experiences.       Superb verbal communication.       Ability to switch your communication style on a whim.       Superb interpersonal, research, and record-keeping skills.       Capacity to receive critique without internalizing it.

column2: Position Overview:  As a Tele Sales Executive with exceptional English communication skills, you will be instrumental in driving sales growth through engaging conversations with potential customers over the phone. You will play a pivotal role in generating leads, promoting our products or services, and converting prospects into satisfied customers. This position offers a competitive salary ranging from 10,000 to 15,000 INR along with attractive sales incentives based on performance. Key Responsibilities: Lead Generation:  Proactively make outbound calls to identify and qualify potential leads using provided scripts and strategies. Sales Pitch:  Deliver compelling sales pitches in fluent English, highlighting product features, benefits, and competitive advantages to capture the interest of potential customers. Customer Engagement:  Build rapport with customers through active listening, empathy, and effective communication to understand their needs and provide suitable solutions. Sales Conversion:  Utilize persuasive selling techniques to close sales and achieve individual and team sales targets. Follow-up:  Maintain regular follow-up with leads to nurture relationships, address concerns, and facilitate the sales process to closure. Incentive Achievement:  Strive to exceed sales targets to earn attractive sales incentives in addition to the base salary. Documentation:  Accurately record customer information, sales interactions, and sales activities in the CRM system for tracking and reporting purposes. Continuous Learning:  Stay updated on product knowledge, sales techniques, and market trends to enhance sales effectiveness and performance. Requirements: Fluent English Communication:  Exceptional verbal communication skills in English with a clear accent and the ability to articulate ideas persuasively. Sales Experience:  Previous experience in tele sales or a similar role preferred, with a demonstrated track record of achieving sales targets. Customer-Centric Approach:  Strong customer focus with the ability to understand customer needs, address objections, and provide solutions to enhance customer satisfaction. Resilience:  Resilient mindset with the ability to handle rejection, overcome challenges, and maintain motivation to achieve sales goals. Incentive-driven:  Motivated by sales incentives and rewards, with a hunger for exceeding targets and earning additional income
column11: Excellent Verbal Communication Active Listening Salesmanship Customer Relationship Management Resilience Time Management Adaptability Product Knowledge Computer Literacy Negotiation Skills

Key Responsibilities:         Make outbound calls to prospective customers or existing clients as per assigned lists or databases.     Introduce products or services, explain their features, and highlight their benefits to potential customers.     Answer incoming calls from customers, address their inquiries, and provide accurate and timely information.     Follow scripts or call guidelines provided by the organization while making calls to ensure consistency and professionalism.     Maintain a customer database, update customer information, and record relevant details of each call for future reference.     Achieve daily, weekly, and monthly targets in terms of call volumes, leads generated, or sales closed.     Identify customer needs and preferences, offer appropriate solutions, and upsell or cross-sell products or services wherever applicable.     Follow up with customers via phone calls or emails to nurture leads, address concerns, and maintain customer satisfaction.     Collaborate with team members, sales representatives, or other departments to resolve customer issues or escalate complex queries.     Stay updated with product knowledge, industry trends, and competitive offerings to provide accurate and relevant information to customers.     Adhere to company policies, guidelines, and ethical standards while interacting with customers and handling sensitive information.     Provide regular feedback and reports on customer interactions, sales conversions, and market insights to the supervisor or team leader.         Qualifications and Skills:         High school diploma or equivalent qualification required. Additional certifications in customer service or sales will be an advantage.     Proven experience in telemarketing, customer service, or sales roles preferred.     Excellent verbal communication skills with a clear and pleasant phone manner.     Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities to convert leads into sales.     Active listening skills to understand customer needs and respond accordingly.     Basic computer knowledge and familiarity with CRM software or call center systems.     Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously.     Strong organizational skills and attention to detail to maintain accurate customer records.     Positive and resilient attitude with the ability to handle rejection and objections professionally.     Proficiency in multiple languages may be advantageous depending on the target customer base

column2: Sales Responsibilities:Outbound Sales Calls: Place outbound calls to potential customers or clients with the aim of selling a product or service     Lead Generation: Identify and qualify sales leads through various sources, such as purchased lists, marketing campaigns, or referrals     Product Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of the products or services being offered to effectively communicate their features and benefits to potential customers     Customer Relationship Building: Establish and maintain strong relationships with customers, guiding them through the sales process and addressing their concerns and questions     Closing Sales: Utilize persuasive and negotiation skills to close sales deals, including handling objections and overcoming resistance     Sales Targets: Meet or exceed sales targets and quotas set by the organization     Marketing Responsibilities:Market Research: Conduct market research to identify target demographics, customer preferences, and competitive landscape     Marketing Campaigns: Plan and execute marketing campaigns, which may involve email marketing, social media marketing, or other online and offline methods     Lead Nurturing: Engage with leads generated through marketing efforts, providing information and building interest in the product or service     Database Management: Maintain customer databases and records, ensuring accuracy and compliance with data protection regulations     Feedback Collection: Gather customer feedback and insights, which can be used to improve marketing strategies and product offerings     Analytics: Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing campaigns, track key metrics, and use data to make informed marketing decisions     Compliance and Data Protection:Ensure compliance with telemarketing regulations and data protection laws, such as the Telephone Consumer Protection Act (TCPA) in the United States and GDPR in Europe     Obtain necessary permissions for marketing and sales communications, including managing opt-out requests     Technology Proficiency:Be proficient in using customer relationship management (CRM) software, marketing automation tools, and call center software for efficient management of sales and marketing activities

column2: You ll research and build contact lists, make outbound cold calls/emails to those who fit our Ideal Customer Profile (ICP), and will then partner with AE's to get customers onboarded      This position will spend roughly 80% of the time on the phone or email prospecting for new clients      Generate high volume quality MQLs through various direct sales efforts such as calls, emails, events, webinars, and other channels generated by marketing initiatives.      Make daily outbound calls/emails to prospects who have demonstrated interest.      Follow up on all calls and emails until meetings are booked or you ve been able to move the prospect through the funnel to an SQL/SAL      Record all activities and properly manage lead stage/flow in our CRM - Hubspot proficiency will be a big plus.      Achieve or exceed monthly quotas of meetings, demos, and qualified leads worked with AEs      Schedule product demos on AE's calendar      Establish BANT by asking the right questions about the prospect's business, and their challenges, and helping them understand how Docyt will help them solve those challenges          What we're looking for:          Must have BDR/SDR experience in the SaaS or similar software space - accounting knowledge is a huge plus.      Willingness to work on U.S.-based hours      Great speaking self-awareness and ability to read prospect signals and adjust accordingly to move the prospect down the funnel - strong English proficiency is key.      Must have a clear, easy-to-understand phone voice and a professional Zoom presence with the ability to engage and empathize over the phone.      Hands-on experience with multiple sales prospecting techniques like cold calling, cold emailing, video conference selling, and social outreach is a must.      Must be a great listener with an ability to address objections graciously and frame the next steps clearly.      Good writers and creative thinkers are needed - must be able to craft well-written (great grammar and spelling), compelling emails, and responses that lead prospects down the funnel.      Verifiable track record of success and goal attainment in a frontline sales-oriented role      Deep knowledge of software and social networks (especially LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter) is important.      Track record of (over)achieving sales quotas.      Must have a strong, self-motivated drive, passion, and desire to deliver results      Experience in a fast-growing startup environment is a big plus          Strong Salary plus incentive-based commission      Be part of an exciting and fast-growing SaaS organization      An impactful role with lots of growth potential      A lot of freedom to apply your creative and strategic skills      A work-hard, play-hard environment      PTO and Company Holidays      Monthly company-wide all hands meetings      An OKR driven team so everyone is on the same page

column2: As a Tele-caller, you will play a vital role in the organizations sales or customer support team by reaching out to potential customers or existing clients over the phone. Your primary objective will be to engage with prospects, introduce products or services, provide information, and persuade them to take the desired action, such as making a purchase, scheduling an appointment, or resolving their queries and concerns.   Responsibilities:      Outbound Calls: Initiate outbound calls to potential customers from provided lists, or follow up with existing clients to maintain relationships and provide support.         Sales or Support Pitch: Deliver product or service pitches, highlighting key features and benefits to potential customers. In case of support calls, listen attentively to customers issues and provide appropriate solutions or escalate to the relevant department.         Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential leads through effective questioning and data gathering during conversations.         Customer Engagement: Build rapport with prospects or customers, actively listen to their needs, and address their questions or concerns with professionalism and empathy.         Information Dissemination: Clearly communicate information regarding products, services, pricing, promotions, and any other relevant details to customers.         Record Keeping: Accurately document and maintain call records, including details of conversations, lead status, and follow-up actions, in the database or CRM system.         Sales Targets: Achieve weekly or monthly sales targets, where applicable, and contribute to the teams overall success.         Follow-Up Calls: Schedule and conduct follow-up calls to nurture leads and maintain relationships with existing customers.         Feedback and Reporting: Provide feedback on customer responses, product/service feedback, and areas for improvement to the supervisor or management.         Adherence to Scripts and Guidelines: Follow the provided call scripts, sales pitches, and call guidelines to maintain consistency in communication and ensure compliance with company policies.     Qualifications and Skills:      High school diploma or equivalent; some organizations may require a bachelors degree or relevant certifications.         Proven experience as a tele-caller or in a customer support or sales role is advantageous but not always mandatory.         Excellent verbal communication skills, including active listening and clear articulation.         Ability to engage customers and build rapport over the phone.         Persuasive skills to influence potential customers positively.         Familiarity with relevant computer software and CRM systems for call logging and management.         Ability to work in a target-driven environment and meet set goals.         Time management skills to prioritize and handle a high volume of calls effectively.         Patience, empathy, and problem-solving skills to address customer concerns.         Flexibility to adapt to changing scenarios and customer behaviors.         Being able to speak English, Hindi, Marathi, or Gujarati will be an added advantage.

column2: Eligibility Criteria for Tele Retail Sales Executive: Female Graduate with decent communication skills in Telugu, Hindi & English. Telesales experience will be an added advantage. Experience:0 to 2Yrs Job Description: MedPlus offers both offline and online customer service to meet Customers Medicine and other product requirements. Concierge Department endeavors to enhance Customer experience in Online platform (Medplusmart.com/App). Concierge Team members interact with Customers to understand their requirement, check availability, suggest additional products/offers, place the order and also inform the Customer regarding Invoice value, amount saved and expected delivery timelines. Concierge team members assist the Customers in after sale service by resolving customer queries and issues (if any). Concierge team members interact with various other departments while completing above mentioned tasks. Work Location: Y-Junction Kukatpally , Hyderabad. Work Schedule & Shift Timing:  6 days a week (rotational week off) Rotational shifts: 7 AM to 4 PM 11 AM to 8 PM Compensation + Perks:  CTC: 2.34 LPA (Including PF, ESI, Gratuity) + Additional Incentives & Yearly Bonus Annual Performance Appraisal for salary increments from the end of the first year (aligned with standard appraisal cycle & norms) Work Agreement:A mandatory 2-year work agreement for selected candidates. Procedure for Selection: written examination to gauge aptitude, then in-person interview. Exam Location & Interview Time: MedPlus Health Services Pvt Ltd, Bhavani Nagar, Balanagar, Hyderabad, Telangana 500037. The following link will take you to Google Maps: https://www.google.com/maps?q=17.471996307373047,78.42878723144531&z=17&hl=en The Written Exam will be Conducted on June 13, 2024, at 10.30 a.m. (Exam Duration One Hour).

column2: We are seeking a resilient and goal-oriented individual to join our team as a Customer Sales and Debt Collection Representative. This position involves a dynamic and challenging environment,?requiring a candidate who thrives under pressure, is willing to stretch working hours, and is motivated by performance incentives.?In this role, you will be responsible for upselling products/services to existing clients, managing debt collection, and maximizing revenue opportunities. **Key Responsibilities:** 1. **Upselling:** ? ?- Proactively engage with existing clients to introduce new products/services and achieve upselling targets. ? ?- Tailor sales strategies to individual customer needs, showcasing a deep understanding of our offerings. ? ?- Adapt to a fast-paced environment and handle a high volume of customer interactions. 2. **Debt Collection:** ? ?- Initiate contact with customers to address overdue accounts, negotiate payment plans, and ensure timely debt recovery. ? ?- Manage a portfolio of accounts, implementing effective collection strategies under tight deadlines. ? ?- Navigate challenging conversations with empathy and professionalism. 3. **Customer Communication:** ? ?- Provide exceptional customer service, addressing inquiries, and building positive relationships. ? ?- Communicate clearly and persuasively to convey the value of additional products/services. 4. **Incentive-Driven Performance:** ? ?- Meet and exceed sales and debt collection targets to qualify for performance incentives. ? ?- Embrace a results-oriented mindset, constantly seeking opportunities to enhance performance. **Qualifications:** - High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or relevant certifications a plus. - Proven experience in sales, upselling, or debt collection roles. - Exceptional communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. - Ability to thrive under pressure and handle a high-stress environment. - Flexibility to work extended hours as needed to meet business demands. **Requirements:** - Demonstrated ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team. - Willingness to stretch working hours and adapt to a dynamic schedule. - Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and resilience in challenging situations. - Familiarity with CRM software and basic computer skills. - Adherence to ethical business practices and compliance with relevant regulations. **Incentives:** - Competitive incentive structure based on achieving and exceeding targets. If you are a self-motivated individual who excels in a challenging and dynamic work environment, and you are driven by the opportunity for incentives, we invite you to apply. Join our team and contribute to our success by maximizing revenue, ensuring positive customer relationships, and enjoying the rewards of your hard work. --

column2: Qualification:       High school diploma or equivalent       Job Overview      We are interested in hiring a dedicated and mature individual as a Telecaller to join our Pre-Sales Sales Department.         Your main goal is to boost our sales by reaching out to the existing customers as well as potential customers. As a Telecaller, you are responsible for handling sales over the phone entirely. You are also responsible for solving questions in regard to the product or service provided by the company.         In addition to this, you should collect desired information from the clients and maintain healthy relations with them. You are required to understand the customer s requirements and demands and close the sales deal efficiently. You are also required to write down important information provided by the customer and follow up with them on a regular basis.         As an ideal candidate, you should be an excellent communicator along with convincing abilities. Great report writing skills, amazing negotiation skills, and phenomenal telephone etiquette are essential for this position.         If you are ready to take up these duties and responsibilities of Presales Executive/Manager or Telecaller, then apply right away. We will love to meet you.     Responsibilities      Answering phones and explaining the product and services offered by the company         Contacting existing customers as well as prospective customers using scripts         Obtaining customer information and other relevant data         Asking questions to the customer and understanding their specifications         Resolving queries and issues related to the products and services         Making recordings of all the sales phone calls and sales deals         Taking and processing product orders in a professional manner         Maintaining the database of the customers on a regular basis         Suggesting solutions based on customer s needs and requirements         Most important, have potential to close the lead on call, conversion ratio of 90% + over call     Requirements      English mandatory         Work experience as a Telecaller, TeleMarketer, or a similar role in the Sales Department         Professional certification sales and marketing will be an advantage         Great interpersonal skills         Exceptional oral and written communication skills         Strong organizational skills         Ability to work in a team or individually as and when required         Ability to manage and handle multiple tasks         Outstanding problem-solving skills         Exceptional attention to detail         Hard-working individual         Good time management abilities         Strong decision-making skills

column2: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated  Telecaller  |  Telesales  |  Inside Sales  for our client partner.  You will be responsible for reaching out to potential clients, providing them with information about available properties, and assisting them through the buying or renting process. The role requires excellent communication skills, a friendly and persuasive attitude, and the ability to handle rejections gracefully.    Key Skills requirements: Prior experience in telemarketing, customer service, or Inside sales Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to convey information clearly and persuasively.  Ability to build rapport with clients and handle objections. Basic computer skills, including familiarity with MS Office. Strong organizational and time management skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively. Ability to think on your feet and handle unexpected situations calmly and efficiently.    Key Responsibilities: Lead Management: Contact potential clients through cold calling, email, and other communication channels. Qualify leads based on their requirements and preferences. Client Interaction: Provide detailed information about available properties, including pricing, location, amenities, and other relevant details. Answer questions and address concerns from prospective buyers or tenants. Schedule property viewings and appointments for interested clients. Follow-Up: Maintain regular follow-up with potential clients to nurture relationships and encourage them to proceed with the transaction. Update the status of each lead in the CRM system. Gather feedback from clients and report to the management for improving services. Sales Support: Assist the sales team in closing deals by providing necessary information and coordinating with clients. Handle basic documentation and paperwork related to property transactions. Customer Service: Ensure a high level of customer satisfaction by providing prompt and accurate information. Resolve any issues or complaints from clients in a timely and professional manner.

column2: Good communication skills with a customer-centric approach in English and Hindi are mandatory. Proven experience in Inside sales/ telesales/outbound sales/upselling/telemarketing/cold calling/domestic sales is mandatory. POSITION SUMMARY: As an Inside Sales Executive specialising in Tyres, you will be responsible for engaging potential customers over the phone to promote and sell a variety of tyres for different vehicles. The primary focus will be on building strong customer relationships, understanding their needs, and providing tailored tyre solutions. The role involves effective communication, product knowledge, and achieving sales targets. Job Title : Inside Sales Executive. Employment type : Full-time, Permanent. PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:  Customer Engagement: Initiate outbound calls to prospective customers to introduce and promote the range of tyres available. Product Knowledge: Stay informed about the features, specifications, and benefits of different tyre brands and models. Sales Target Achievement: Set and achieve sales targets through effective telesales techniques. Order Processing: Guide customers through the online purchasing process, ensuring a smooth and efficient transaction.. Customer Relationship Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of customer interactions in the CRM system. Market Intelligence: Stay informed about market trends, competitor offerings, and industry developments related to tyres. Desired Skills:   High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or certifications in sales will be a plus. Proven experience in telesales, preferably in the automotive or tyre industry. Excellent communication skills with a customer-centric approach in English and Hindi. Strong product knowledge and the ability to articulate technical details simply. Goal-oriented, with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Familiarity with CRM systems and basic computer skills. Resilience and ability to handle objections and rejection positively. Location/Company   Address: 1st. Floor, 115, Lalbagh Fort Rd, next to Nandhini Hotel, near Minerva Circle, Parvathipuram,  Vishweshwarapura, Basavanagudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004.

column2: SAIIOS is looking for Tele Sales & Marketing to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      A tele sales executive, also known as a telemarketer or inside sales representative, is a professional who sells products or services over the phone      They work in call centers or contact centers and engage in outbound calls to reach potential customers, build relationships, and generate sales      The responsibilities of a telesales executive typically include:Making Outbound Calls: Initiating outbound calls to prospective customers using a pre-defined list or database      These calls may be cold calls (contacting leads who have no prior interaction with the company) or warm calls (following up with interested leads or existing customers)      Product or Service Presentation: Presenting and explaining the features, benefits, and value proposition of the products or services being offered      This involves effective communication skills to engage the customer, address their needs, and highlight the unique selling points of the offerings      Handling Customer Inquiries: Responding to customer inquiries and providing information about the products or services      This may involve addressing questions, clarifying doubts, and overcoming objections to persuade the customer to make a purchase      Lead Qualification and Follow-Up: Assessing the potential of leads based on specific criteria or qualifications      Telesales executives determine whether a lead is likely to convert into a sale and prioritize follow-up activities accordingly      Sales Conversion and Closing Deals: Using persuasive selling techniques to convince potential customers to make a purchase      Telesales executives negotiate prices, offer discounts or promotions, and guide customers through the purchasing process to close the sale      Relationship Building: Building rapport and developing relationships with customers to enhance customer loyalty and encourage repeat business      Telesales executives may maintain regular contact with customers, provide after-sales support, and explore opportunities for upselling or cross-selling      Sales Reporting and Documentation: Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, sales activities, and outcomes      This includes updating customer details, recording sales transactions, and generating reports on sales performance and targets      Product Knowledge and Training: Acquiring and maintaining a deep understanding of the products or services being sold      Telesales executives need to be well-versed in product features, specifications, pricing, and frequently asked questions to effectively address customer inquiries      Meeting Sales Targets: Working towards achieving individual and team sales targets set by the organization      Telesales executives are often expected to meet specific sales quotas and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to sales conversion, call volume, and revenue generation      Effective communication skills, persuasive abilities, resilience, and persistence are crucial for success in a tele sales executive role      Active listening, empathy, and adaptability to different customer personalities and situations are also important for building rapport and satisfying customer needs
column11: upselling, revenue generation, relationship building, presentation skills, lead qualification, customer interaction, sales activities, sales, inside sales, marketing, promotions, outbound, telesales, ups, reporting, communication skills, follow ups

column2: Enser Communications Private Limited is looking for Customer Acquisition Expert to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Customer Acquisition Expert, you will be responsible for developing and executing strategies to attract and acquire new customers for the company      Leveraging your expertise in digital marketing, sales, and customer relationship management, you will implement targeted campaigns and initiatives to drive lead generation, conversion, and revenue growth      Your goal will be to identify and engage with potential customers across various channels, optimize the customer acquisition process, and maximize the return on investment (ROI) of marketing efforts        Responsibilities:        Strategy Development: Collaborate with the marketing team and senior management to develop customer acquisition strategies aligned with business objectives, target audience profiles, and market trends      Campaign Planning and Execution: Plan, implement, and manage multi-channel marketing campaigns to generate leads and acquire new customers, utilizing a mix of digital, social media, email, content, and other marketing channels      Lead Generation: Identify and prioritize target customer segments and market niches, leveraging data-driven insights, market research, and customer analysis to generate high-quality leads and prospects      Content Creation: Develop compelling and relevant content assets, including blog posts, articles, whitepapers, case studies, and landing pages, to attract and engage potential customers at various stages of the buyer's journey      SEO and SEM: Optimize website content and structure for search engine visibility, implement search engine marketing (SEM) campaigns, and manage pay-per-click (PPC) advertising to drive traffic and conversions      Social Media Management: Manage company social media accounts, develop engaging content, interact with followers, and run targeted advertising campaigns to expand brand reach and attract new customers      Email Marketing: Design and execute email marketing campaigns, including lead nurturing sequences, promotional offers, newsletters, and customer segmentation strategies to drive engagement and conversions      Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs), campaign metrics, and customer acquisition costs (CAC) to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing initiatives and optimize campaign performance

column2: Job description At Angel One, our thriving culture is rooted in Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI). As an Equal opportunity employer, we wholeheartedly welcome people from all backgrounds irrespective of caste, religion, gender, marital status, sexuality, disability, class or age to be part of our team. We believe that everyone's unique experiences and viewpoints make us stronger together. Come and be a part of #OneSpace*, where your individuality is celebrated and embraced. #Onespace is Angel Ones DEI Project.221 As a Tele Sales Representative for Mutual Fund Business and Services, your primary responsibility will be to drive sales and promote our mutual fund products and services through telephonic communication. You will engage with prospective MFDs, provide information about our offerings, address inquiries, and ultimately secure sales. This role demands strong communication skills, a solid understanding of mutual fund products, and the ability to effectively convey the benefits of our services to potential investors. 1.  Outbound Calling: ??nitiate outbound calls to potential MFDs/clients to introduce our mutual fund products and services. ??tilize lead lists, databases, and other resources to identify and reach out to MFDs. ??rive key business parameters:-Need to ensure to achieve minimum business from MFDs (activation, SIP & drive Lumpsum). ??nboarding of MFDs/acquisition of KYC. 2.  Product Presentation: ??resent information about our mutual fund products, including their features, benefits, and performance. ??xplain the various investment options available and help clients understand how they align with their financial goals. 3.  Objection Handling: ??ddress any concerns or objections raised by prospects regarding mutual fund investments, fees, risks, etc. ??rovide accurate and transparent information to alleviate concerns and build trust with MFDs. 4.  Closing Sales: ??tilize effective sales techniques to overcome objections and persuade prospects to invest in our mutual fund products. ??uide MFDs/clients through the account opening and investment process, ensuring a seamless experience. 5.  Relationship Management: ??uild and maintain strong relationships with MFDs by providing ongoing support, assistance, and personalized advice. ??eep MFDs informed about market updates, performance reports, and other relevant information to help them make informed investment decisions. Interested candidates share your CV at sathvik.bs@angelbroking.com

column2: Job Title : Telecaller  Location : Abids , Hyderabad Salary:  13,000 to 18,000 per month Work Hours:  Full-time 9:45 am to 7:00 pm  6 day working 1 rotational off We are seeking a motivated and enthusiastic Telecaller to join our team. The Telecaller will be responsible for making outbound calls to potential and existing customers to promote our products/services, handle customer inquiries, and gather market research. The ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills, a persuasive manner, and the ability to handle rejection professionally. Key Responsibilities: Outbound Calls : Make outbound calls to potential and existing customers to promote products or services. Lead Generation:  Identify and generate leads through cold calling, referrals, and online research. Product Promotion:  Explain and promote products/services to customers, highlighting features and benefits. Customer Interaction:  Handle customer inquiries and resolve any issues or complaints promptly. Sales Conversion:  Persuade potential customers to purchase products/services and achieve sales targets. Database Management:  Maintain and update customer information in the database accurately. Follow-up:  Follow up on leads and prospects to ensure high conversion rates. Feedback Collection:  Gather feedback from customers regarding their experience and suggestions for improvement. Market Research:  Conduct market research to identify potential sales opportunities and trends. Report Generation:  Prepare daily/weekly/monthly reports on call activities and sales achievements. Qualifications and Skills: Education:  Graduates in any field. Experience:  Previous experience in telemarketing, sales, or customer service is preferred. Communication Skills:  Excellent verbal communication skills with a clear and pleasant voice. Customer Service:  Ability to handle customer queries and complaints professionally. Language Skills:  Proficiency in English, Hindi and other native languages. Working Conditions: Work Environment: Typically works in an office or call center environment.  Call us at:-  6388279414

column2: The ideal candidate for this role is that you are a proven sales performer adept in direct-toconsumer  consultative sales. You are comfortable working with high ticket size products that require focussed  nurturing over a period and yet can build urgency for the end consumer to decide fast. You have  worked in a highly competitive sales environment and have been at the top 10 percentile of your  team.   What will you be doing? Being a mentor and guide, who potential learners can look up to for career advice.   Counselling potential learners, helping them plan their career path and understanding how  upGrad can catalyse their career.   Carrying weekly enrolment/revenue and collection targets.   Establishing the uniqueness and effectiveness of upGrad's model of online/blended learning.    Owning the complete sales closing life cycle for leads assigned to you. This includes making  phone/video calls, product demonstration, sales closing and post-sales relationship management.    Maintaining a detailed database of all the interactions on the CRM with the leads and providing  constant feedback to the marketing team on lead quality.  What are we looking for?    Individual with outstanding English communication skills (written and verbal), interpersonal and  presentation skills.    Hardworking Individuals with high dedication and extreme determination. Experience in EdTech  sales would be an advantage.   Rockstar sales performers with proven track records.    Great listeners and trustworthy individuals who can bond with our potential learners. Individuals  with the ability to approach any situation with patience and powerful empathy.    Individuals who take a disciplined approach towards building funnels, tracking feedback,  prioritising tasks and overachieving targets and deadlines.    Sales bent of mind, to understand and effectively communicate what upGrad is offering to its  prospective learners and achieve revenue targets.   Passion for always delivering the highest levels of customer service.   Basic proficiency in MS Office Suite is required.   What are your deliverables / KPI's?   Minimum of 100+ Dials every day with 40+ Connects.   2 hours of talk time on an average per day & 1 Video Session   2 enrolled students per week.   Weekly revenue targets to be met consistently.
