column2: Job Title:  Inside Sales Executive-Agra(M/F) Experience:  3-8 years Location:  M.G Road, Agra Job Type:  Full-time   Job Overview:   As an Inside Sales Executive, you'll be at the forefront of our sales efforts, responsible for driving revenue growth through proactive outreach and strategic relationship-building. If you're passionate about sales, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and enjoy exceeding targets, we want you on our team!   Key Responsibilities: Prospecting:  Identify and qualify potential leads through research, cold calling, and email outreach. Consultative Selling:  Understand client needs and pain points to effectively present solutions and drive sales conversions. Pipeline Management:  Manage and prioritize a high volume of leads to maximize sales opportunities and meet targets. Relationship Building:  Cultivate strong relationships with prospects and clients to foster loyalty and repeat business. Sales Reporting:  Maintain accurate records of sales activities and provide regular reports on performance metrics. Collaboration:  Work closely with the marketing team to align sales strategies with marketing initiatives and campaigns.   Qualifications: Proven track record in inside sales or a similar role, with a demonstrable history of meeting or exceeding targets. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage prospects effectively. Strong negotiation and closing skills, with a focus on delivering exceptional customer value. Self-motivated and results-oriented, with a drive to succeed in a competitive sales environment. Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field preferred.   Perks and Benefits: Competitive salary with lucrative commission structure. Comprehensive training and professional development opportunities. Dynamic and inclusive work culture with opportunities for growth and advancement. Health insurance, retirement plans, and other benefits package. Interested candidates can share their resume at  recruitment@oswaalbooks.com / hrlead@oswaalbooks.com
column11: Lead Generation, Inside Sales, HIRING, CALLING, AGRA, SALES

column2: Role & responsibilities     Act as a liaison between the sales team and customers, handling inquiries, product demonstrations, and sales transactions. Coordinate sales activities, including lead generation, prospecting, and follow-up to support the achievement of sales targets. Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat in a timely and professional manner, providing product information and assistance as needed. Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, sales orders, and transactions in the CRM system. Assist in preparing sales quotations, proposals, and presentations for prospective customers. Collaborate with the sales team to identify new business opportunities and potential customers within the assigned territory. Provide sales support to channel partners, distributors, and resellers, ensuring timely delivery of products and resolving any issues or concerns. Conduct market research and analysis to identify market trends, competitor activities, and customer preferences. Stay updated on product knowledge, pricing, promotions, and sales policies to effectively communicate with customers and support sales efforts. Assist in organizing sales events, exhibitions, and promotional activities to increase brand awareness and generate leads. Coordinate with other departments, such as marketing and customer support, to ensure seamless execution of sales initiatives and customer satisfaction. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Proven experience in sales coordination, customer service, or related roles. Fluency in Telugu - Tamil, and Tamil- Malayalam, Kannada and Hindi languages is required. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish positive relationships with customers and colleagues.   If you meet the above requirements and are ready to contribute to our dynamic team immediately, please send your resume and a brief cover letter to our email ID: hr@netprotector.net Cc: dhanashree.gadekar@netprotector.net vipin.menon@netprotector.net

column2: Jotwani Law Offices  represents some of the top global software publishers. We help our clients to eradicate piracy and counterfeiting of their products. In this regard, we are seeking a highly motivated Sales cum Compliance Executive to join our law firm.  **Key Responsibilities:* 1. Take phone calls on assigned leads seeking sales of our client's software products. 2. Follow up with leads using pirated (unlicensed) software of our client and convert them into a sales opportunity.  3.  Ability to effectively communicate on the phone, emails, and WhatsApp with clients, customers and high management officials.   **Qualifications:** 1. Bachelor's degree in Sales, Management, Computer Science, Information Technology, Commerce, Business Administration, or a related field. 2. Experience in Sales in software will be an added advantage **Location:** This position is full-time based at our Noida office. **We Offer:** Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for career growth and advancement. A collaborative and innovative work environment. If you're passionate about compliance and want to play a key role in shaping the future in the software industry, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team!

column1: Niva Bupa is hiring Sales Associates For Banca Channel Process ||
column2: About the Role: Niva Bupa Health Insurance is seeking a highly motivated and results-oriented individual to join our Telesale-Banca Channel team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving sales of health insurance products through established partnerships with banks and their branches. You will be instrumental in achieving and exceeding sales targets while providing exceptional customer service.   Key Roles & Responsibilities: Achieve and surpass monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets assigned. Proactively prospect for new business opportunities within designated campaigns. Conduct in-depth needs assessments to identify suitable health insurance products, services, and solutions for clients. Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to foster repeat business. Establish and nurture relationships with bank and branch managers to generate new leads and sales. Demonstrate punctuality, reliability, and organization in all client interactions. Handle rejections and challenging client situations with grace and maturity.   Key Requirements- Bachelor's Degree (any stream) Minimum 1 year of sales experience, with a minimum of 3-6 months in health insurance sales preferred. Proven track record of exceeding sales targets. Excellent sales, objection handling, and negotiation skills. Fluency in English and Hindi.   Salary: 20k to 25k per month   Additional Notes: This is a full-time position. Strong communication and interpersonal skills are essential. Ability to work independently and as part of a team is crucial. Knowledge of the health insurance industry is a plus.
